where inequality (a) follows from the fact that âŸ¨u,vâŸ©â‰¤12â€‹(â€–uâ€–22+â€–vâ€–22)ğ‘¢ğ‘£12superscriptsubscriptnormğ‘¢22superscriptsubscriptnormğ‘£22\left\langle u,v\right\rangle\leq\frac{1}{2}(\left\|{u}\right\|_{2}^{2}+\left\|{v}\right\|_{2}^{2}) for any u,vğ‘¢ğ‘£u,v of the same dimension. Notably, Eq.(21) is the key step that enables us to control ğ”¼â€‹[â€–âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~t/ğ’®twiâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22âˆ£â„±t]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsuperscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|{\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}/{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right] in terms of Ïµitalic-Ïµ\epsilon.

ByÂ AssumptionÂ 2, we have

âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~t/ğ’®twi=âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~t/ğ’®tniNâ‰¤Kâ€‹ÏµM=pâ€‹Ïµ.subscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–subscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘›ğ‘–ğ‘ğ¾italic-Ïµğ‘€ğ‘italic-Ïµ\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}/{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}=\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}/{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}\frac{n_{i}}{N}\leq\frac{K\epsilon}{M}=p\epsilon. (22)

Hence, it suffices to show

ğ”¼â€‹[âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~twiâ€‹â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22âˆ£â„±t]â‰¤pâ€‹(B2â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22+G2+Ïƒ2),ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsubscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡ğ‘superscriptğµ2superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22superscriptğº2superscriptğœ2\mathbb{E}\left[\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]\leq p\left(B^{2}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}+G^{2}+\sigma^{2}\right),

for which we have

ğ”¼â€‹[âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~twiâ€‹â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22âˆ£â„±t]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsubscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right] =ğ”¼â€‹[âˆ‘i=1Mwiâ€‹â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22â€‹ğŸ{iâˆˆğ’®~t}âˆ£â„±t]absentğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘€subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22subscript1ğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\left[\sum_{i=1}^{M}w_{i}\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}{\mathbf{1}_{\left\{{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}\right\}}}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]
=(a)â€‹âˆ‘i=1Mwiâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹[â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22âˆ£â„±t]â€‹ğ”¼â€‹[ğŸ{iâˆˆğ’®~t}âˆ£â„±t]ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘€subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsuperscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsubscript1ğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{=}\sum_{i=1}^{M}w_{i}\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]\mathbb{E}\left[{\mathbf{1}_{\left\{{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}\right\}}}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]
=(b)â€‹pâ€‹âˆ‘i=1Mwiâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹[â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22âˆ£â„±t]ğ‘ğ‘superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘€subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsuperscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle\overset{(b)}{=}p\sum_{i=1}^{M}w_{i}\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]
â‰¤(c)â€‹pâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[M]wiâ€‹(â€–âˆ‡Fiâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22+Ïƒi2)ğ‘ğ‘subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘€subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘–subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22superscriptsubscriptğœğ‘–2\displaystyle\overset{(c)}{\leq}p\sum_{i\in[M]}w_{i}\left(\left\|{\nabla F_{i}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}+\sigma_{i}^{2}\right)
=(d)â€‹pâ€‹(âˆ‘iâˆˆ[M]wiâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fiâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22+Ïƒ2)ğ‘‘ğ‘subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘€subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘–subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22superscriptğœ2\displaystyle\overset{(d)}{=}p\left(\sum_{i\in[M]}w_{i}\left\|{\nabla F_{i}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}+\sigma^{2}\right)
â‰¤(e)â€‹pâ€‹(B2â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22+G2+Ïƒ2),ğ‘’ğ‘superscriptğµ2superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22superscriptğº2superscriptğœ2\displaystyle\overset{(e)}{\leq}p\left(B^{2}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}+G^{2}+\sigma^{2}\right), (23)

where equality (a) is true because, as mentioned before, ğ’®~tsubscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t} and zi,tsubscriptğ‘§ğ‘–ğ‘¡z_{i,t} are mutually independent; equality (b) holds because ğ’®~tsubscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t} is independent of â„±tsubscriptâ„±ğ‘¡{\mathcal{F}}_{t}; inequality (c) follows from the fact that Î¸tsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡\theta_{t} is adapted to â„±tsubscriptâ„±ğ‘¡{\mathcal{F}}_{t} and (6), so that

ğ”¼â€‹[â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22âˆ£â„±t]=â€–âˆ‡Fiâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22+ğ”¼â€‹[â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)âˆ’Fiâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22âˆ£â„±t]â‰¤â€–âˆ‡Fiâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22+Ïƒi2;ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsuperscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘–subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsuperscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğ¹ğ‘–subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘–subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22superscriptsubscriptğœğ‘–2\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]=\left\|{\nabla F_{i}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}+\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})-F_{i}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]\leq\left\|{\nabla F_{i}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}+\sigma_{i}^{2};

equality (d) uses the definition of Ïƒ2superscriptğœ2\sigma^{2}; and inequality (e) follows from AssumptionÂ 1. The conclusion follows from (21), (22), and (23). âˆ

C.1.2 Bound on the decrease of the objective function

We are ready to analyze the decrease of the objective function values specified on the right-hand side ofÂ (16) under our dropout model.

Bounding ğ”¼â€‹[âŸ¨âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t),Î¸t+1âˆ’Î¸tâŸ©âˆ£â„±t]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡1subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\mathbb{E}\left[\left\langle\nabla F(\theta_{t}),\theta_{t+1}-\theta_{t}\right\rangle\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]:

PluggingÂ (17), the second term on the right-hand side ofÂ (16) is decomposed into

âŸ¨âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t),Î¸t+1âˆ’Î¸tâŸ©âˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡1subscriptğœƒğ‘¡\displaystyle\left\langle\nabla F(\theta_{t}),\theta_{t+1}-\theta_{t}\right\rangle =âˆ’Î²â€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ‹…âŸ¨âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t),âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®twiâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)âŸ©âŸ(I)absentâ‹…ğ›½ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptâŸâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡I\displaystyle=-\beta s\eta_{t}\cdot\underbrace{\left\langle\nabla F(\theta_{t}),\sum_{i\in{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})\right\rangle}_{\rm(I)}
+Î²â‹…âŸ¨âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t),âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®twiâ€‹(ğ’¢i,tsâ€‹(Î¸t;Î·t)âˆ’Î¸t+sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t))âŸ©âŸ(II).â‹…ğ›½subscriptâŸâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ’¢ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘ subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡II\displaystyle\qquad+\beta\cdot\underbrace{\left\langle\nabla F(\theta_{t}),\sum_{i\in{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}({\mathcal{G}}_{i,t}^{s}(\theta_{t};\eta_{t})-\theta_{t}+s\eta_{t}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t}))\right\rangle}_{\rm(II)}. (24)

For the lower bound of (I), we consider the difference of clients belonging to ğ’®tsubscriptğ’®ğ‘¡{\mathcal{S}}_{t} and ğ’®~tsubscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}:

(I)I\displaystyle\mathrm{(I)} =âŸ¨âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t),âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~twiâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)âŸ©âˆ’âŸ¨âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t),âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~t/ğ’®twiâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)âŸ©absentâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡âˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡\displaystyle=\left\langle\nabla F(\theta_{t}),\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})\right\rangle-\left\langle\nabla F(\theta_{t}),\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}/{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})\right\rangle
â‰¥âŸ¨âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t),âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~twiâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)âŸ©âˆ’â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2â€‹â€–âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~t/ğ’®twiâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2.absentâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2subscriptnormsubscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2\displaystyle\geq\left\langle\nabla F(\theta_{t}),\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})\right\rangle-\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\left\|{\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}/{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}.

Thus,

ğ”¼â€‹[(I)âˆ£â„±t]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalIsubscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\mathrm{(I)}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right] â‰¥ğ”¼â€‹[âŸ¨âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t),âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~twiâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)âŸ©âˆ’â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2â€‹â€–âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~t/ğ’®twiâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2âˆ£â„±t]absentğ”¼delimited-[]âˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡conditionalsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2subscriptnormsubscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle\geq\mathbb{E}\left[\left\langle\nabla F(\theta_{t}),\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})\right\rangle-\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\left\|{\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}/{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]
=âŸ¨âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t),ğ”¼â€‹[âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~twiâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)âˆ£â„±t]âŸ©âˆ’â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹[â€–âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~t/ğ’®twiâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2âˆ£â„±t]absentâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsubscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡subscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsubscriptnormsubscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle=\left\langle\nabla F(\theta_{t}),\mathbb{E}\left[\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]\right\rangle-\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|{\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}/{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]
â‰¥(a)â€‹pâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22âˆ’pâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2â€‹Ïµâ€‹(Bâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸)â€–2+G+Ïƒ),ğ‘ğ‘superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22ğ‘subscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2italic-Ïµğµsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹ğœƒ2ğºğœ\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{\geq}p\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}-p\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\sqrt{\epsilon}\left(B\left\|{\nabla F(\theta)}\right\|_{2}+G+\sigma\right), (25)

where equality (a) follows fromÂ (C.1.1) andÂ LemmaÂ 2.

On (II), we have

(II)II\displaystyle\mathrm{(II)} â‰¤â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2â€‹â€–âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®twiâ€‹(ğ’¢i,tsâ€‹(Î¸t;Î·t)âˆ’Î¸t+sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t))â€–2absentsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2subscriptnormsubscriptğ‘–subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ’¢ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘ subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2\displaystyle\leq\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\left\|{\sum_{i\in{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}({\mathcal{G}}_{i,t}^{s}(\theta_{t};\eta_{t})-\theta_{t}+s\eta_{t}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t}))}\right\|_{2}
â‰¤â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®twiâ€‹â€–ğ’¢i,tsâ€‹(Î¸t;Î·)âˆ’Î¸t+sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2absentsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğ’¢ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘ subscriptğœƒğ‘¡ğœ‚subscriptğœƒğ‘¡ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2\displaystyle\leq\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\sum_{i\in{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\left\|{{\mathcal{G}}_{i,t}^{s}(\theta_{t};\eta)-\theta_{t}+s\eta_{t}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}
â‰¤(a)â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2â€‹Îºâ€‹Î·t2â€‹Lâ€‹(s2)â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®twiâ€‹â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2ğ‘subscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2ğœ…superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2ğ¿binomialğ‘ 2subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{\leq}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\kappa\eta_{t}^{2}L\binom{s}{2}\sum_{i\in{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}
â‰¤(b)â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2â€‹Îºâ€‹Î·t2â€‹Lâ€‹(s2)â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~twiâ€‹â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2,ğ‘subscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2ğœ…superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2ğ¿binomialğ‘ 2subscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2\displaystyle\overset{(b)}{\leq}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\kappa\eta_{t}^{2}L\binom{s}{2}\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2},

where inequality (a) holds fromÂ LemmaÂ 1 and inequality (b) is true because that ğ’®tâŠ†ğ’®~tsubscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡{\mathcal{S}}_{t}\subseteq\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}.

It remains to bound ğ”¼â€‹[âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~twiâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fiâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2âˆ£â„±t]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsubscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘–subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\mathbb{E}\left[\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\left\|{\nabla F_{i}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]. We have

ğ”¼â€‹[âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~twiâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fiâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2âˆ£â„±t]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsubscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘–subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\left\|{\nabla F_{i}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right] =ğ”¼â€‹[âˆ‘i=1Mwiâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fiâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2â€‹ğŸ{iâˆˆğ’®~t}âˆ£â„±t]absentğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘€subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘–subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2subscript1ğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle=\mathbb{E}\left[\sum_{i=1}^{M}w_{i}\left\|{\nabla F_{i}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}{\mathbf{1}_{\left\{{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}\right\}}}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]
=(a)â€‹pâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[M]wiâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fiâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2ğ‘ğ‘subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘€subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘–subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{=}p\sum_{i\in[M]}w_{i}\left\|{\nabla F_{i}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}
â‰¤(b)â€‹pâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[M]wiâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fiâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22ğ‘ğ‘subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘€subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘–subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22\displaystyle\overset{(b)}{\leq}p\sqrt{\sum_{i\in[M]}w_{i}\left\|{\nabla F_{i}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}}
â‰¤(c)â€‹pâ€‹B2â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22+G2ğ‘ğ‘superscriptğµ2superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22superscriptğº2\displaystyle\overset{(c)}{\leq}p\sqrt{B^{2}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}+G^{2}}
â‰¤pâ€‹(Bâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2+G),absentğ‘ğµsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2ğº\displaystyle\leq p\left(B\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}+G\right), (26)

where equality (a) is true by the independent between ğ’®~tsubscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t} and â„±tsubscriptâ„±ğ‘¡{\mathcal{F}}_{t}, inequality (b) holds by Jensenâ€™s inequality, inequality (c) follows fromÂ AssumptionÂ 1.

Analogously,

ğ”¼â€‹[âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~twiâ€‹â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)âˆ’âˆ‡Fiâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2âˆ£â„±t]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsubscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘–subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})-\nabla F_{i}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right] =pâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[M]wiâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹[â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)âˆ’âˆ‡Fiâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2âˆ£â„±t]absentğ‘subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘€subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsubscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘–subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle=p\sum_{i\in[M]}w_{i}\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})-\nabla F_{i}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]
â‰¤(a)â€‹pâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[M]wiâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹[â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)âˆ’âˆ‡Fiâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22âˆ£â„±t]ğ‘ğ‘subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘€subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsuperscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘–subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{\leq}p\sqrt{\sum_{i\in[M]}w_{i}\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})-\nabla F_{i}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]}
â‰¤(b)â€‹pâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆ[M]wiâ€‹Ïƒi2ğ‘ğ‘subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘€subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğœğ‘–2\displaystyle\overset{(b)}{\leq}p\sqrt{\sum_{i\in[M]}w_{i}\sigma_{i}^{2}}
=pâ€‹Ïƒ,absentğ‘ğœ\displaystyle=p\sigma, (27)

where inequality (a) is true by applying Jensenâ€™s inequality twice, and inequality (b) follows fromÂ (6). Combining (26) and (27), we get

ğ”¼â€‹[âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~twiâ€‹â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2âˆ£â„±t]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsubscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right] â‰¤ğ”¼â€‹[âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~twiâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fiâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2âˆ£â„±t]+ğ”¼â€‹[â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)âˆ’âˆ‡Fiâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2âˆ£â„±t]absentğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsubscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘–subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsubscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡âˆ‡subscriptğ¹ğ‘–subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle\leq\mathbb{E}\left[\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\left\|{\nabla F_{i}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]+\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})-\nabla F_{i}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]
â‰¤pâ€‹(Bâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2+G+Ïƒ).absentğ‘ğµsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2ğºğœ\displaystyle\leq p\left(B\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}+G+\sigma\right). (28)

Therefore,

ğ”¼â€‹[(II)âˆ£â„±t]â‰¤pâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2â€‹Îºâ€‹Î·t2â€‹Lâ€‹(s2)â€‹(Bâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2+G+Ïƒ).ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalIIsubscriptâ„±ğ‘¡ğ‘subscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2ğœ…superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2ğ¿binomialğ‘ 2ğµsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2ğºğœ\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\mathrm{(II)}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]\leq p\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\kappa\eta_{t}^{2}L\binom{s}{2}\left(B\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}+G+\sigma\right). (29)

CombiningÂ (25) andÂ (29) together and plugging it back toÂ (24), we get that

ğ”¼â€‹[âŸ¨âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t),Î¸t+1âˆ’Î¸tâŸ©âˆ£â„±t]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡1subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\left\langle\nabla F(\theta_{t}),\theta_{t+1}-\theta_{t}\right\rangle\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right] â‰¤âˆ’Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22+Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2â€‹Ïµâ€‹(Bâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2+G+Ïƒ)absentğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22ğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2italic-Ïµğµsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2ğºğœ\displaystyle\leq-\beta ps\eta_{t}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}+\beta ps\eta_{t}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\sqrt{\epsilon}\left(B\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}+G+\sigma\right)
+Î²â€‹pâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2â€‹Îºâ€‹Î·t2â€‹Lâ€‹(s2)â€‹(Bâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2+G+Ïƒ).ğ›½ğ‘subscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2ğœ…superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2ğ¿binomialğ‘ 2ğµsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2ğºğœ\displaystyle\qquad+\beta p\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\kappa\eta_{t}^{2}L\binom{s}{2}\left(B\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}+G+\sigma\right). (30)
Bounding ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î¸t+1âˆ’Î¸tâ€–22âˆ£â„±t]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsuperscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡1subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|{\theta_{t+1}-\theta_{t}}\right\|_{2}^{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]:

ByÂ (17), we have

â€–Î¸t+1âˆ’Î¸tâ€–2subscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡1subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2\displaystyle\left\|{\theta_{t+1}-\theta_{t}}\right\|_{2} =â€–Î²â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®twiâ€‹(ğ’¢i,tsâ€‹(Î¸t;Î·t)âˆ’Î¸t+sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t))âˆ’Î²â€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®twiâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2absentsubscriptnormğ›½subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ’¢ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘ subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡ğ›½ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2\displaystyle=\left\|{\beta\sum_{i\in{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}({\mathcal{G}}_{i,t}^{s}(\theta_{t};\eta_{t})-\theta_{t}+s\eta_{t}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t}))-\beta s\eta_{t}\sum_{i\in{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}
â‰¤(a)â€‹Î²â€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹â€–âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®twiâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2+Î²â€‹Îºâ€‹Î·t2â€‹Lâ€‹(s2)â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®twiâ€‹â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2ğ‘ğ›½ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptnormsubscriptğ‘–subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2ğ›½ğœ…superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2ğ¿binomialğ‘ 2subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2\displaystyle\overset{(a)}{\leq}\beta s\eta_{t}\left\|{\sum_{i\in{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}+\beta\kappa\eta_{t}^{2}L\binom{s}{2}\sum_{i\in{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}
â‰¤Î²â€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹(1+Îºâ€‹Î·tâ€‹Lâ€‹(sâˆ’1)/2)â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®twiâ€‹â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2absentğ›½ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡1ğœ…subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿ğ‘ 12subscriptğ‘–subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2\displaystyle\leq\beta s\eta_{t}\left(1+\kappa\eta_{t}L(s-1)/2\right)\sum_{i\in{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}
â‰¤Î²â€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹(1+Îºâ€‹Î·tâ€‹Lâ€‹(sâˆ’1)/2)â€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~twiâ€‹âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~twiâ€‹â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22.absentğ›½ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡1ğœ…subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿ğ‘ 12subscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–subscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22\displaystyle\leq\beta s\eta_{t}\left(1+\kappa\eta_{t}L(s-1)/2\right)\sqrt{\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}}\sqrt{\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}}.

where inequality (a) follows from Lemma 1 and the fact that L=maxiâˆˆ[M]â¡Liğ¿subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘€subscriptğ¿ğ‘–L=\max_{i\in[M]}L_{i}; the last inequality holds by the Cauchy-Schwarz inequality. ApplyingÂ (23) and using âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~twiâ‰¤1subscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–1\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\leq 1, we deduce that

ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î¸t+1âˆ’Î¸tâ€–22âˆ£â„±t]â‰¤Î²2â€‹s2â€‹Î·t2â€‹(1+Îºâ€‹Î·tâ€‹Lâ€‹(sâˆ’1)/2)2â€‹pâ€‹(B2â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸)â€–22+G2+Ïƒ2).ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsuperscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡1subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡superscriptğ›½2superscriptğ‘ 2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2superscript1ğœ…subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿ğ‘ 122ğ‘superscriptğµ2superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹ğœƒ22superscriptğº2superscriptğœ2\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|{\theta_{t+1}-\theta_{t}}\right\|_{2}^{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]\leq\beta^{2}s^{2}\eta_{t}^{2}\left(1+\kappa\eta_{t}L(s-1)/2\right)^{2}p\left(B^{2}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta)}\right\|_{2}^{2}+G^{2}+\sigma^{2}\right). (31)
Bounding ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(Î¸t+1)âˆ£â„±t]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡1subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\mathbb{E}\left[F(\theta_{t+1})\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]:

CombiningÂ (30) andÂ (31) together, we applyÂ (16) and get

ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(Î¸t+1)âˆ£â„±t]â‰¤Fâ€‹(Î¸t)âˆ’aÂ¯tâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22+btâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2+ct,ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡1subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptÂ¯ğ‘ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡subscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡\mathbb{E}\left[F(\theta_{t+1})\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]\leq F(\theta_{t})-\bar{a}_{t}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}+b_{t}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}+c_{t},

where

aÂ¯tsubscriptÂ¯ğ‘ğ‘¡\displaystyle\bar{a}_{t} =Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹(1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹Bâˆ’Îºâ€‹(sâˆ’1)â€‹Î·tâ€‹L2â€‹Bâˆ’Î²â€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹L2â€‹(1+Îºâ€‹(sâˆ’1)â€‹Î·tâ€‹L2)2â€‹B2),absentğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡1italic-Ïµğµğœ…ğ‘ 1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿2ğµğ›½ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿2superscript1ğœ…ğ‘ 1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿22superscriptğµ2\displaystyle=\beta ps\eta_{t}\left(1-\sqrt{\epsilon}B-\frac{\kappa(s-1)\eta_{t}L}{2}B-\beta\frac{s\eta_{t}L}{2}\left(1+\frac{\kappa(s-1)\eta_{t}L}{2}\right)^{2}B^{2}\right),
btsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡\displaystyle b_{t} =Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹(Ïµâ€‹(G+Ïƒ)+Îºâ€‹(sâˆ’1)â€‹Î·tâ€‹L2â€‹(G+Ïƒ)),absentğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡italic-Ïµğºğœğœ…ğ‘ 1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿2ğºğœ\displaystyle=\beta ps\eta_{t}\left(\sqrt{\epsilon}\left(G+\sigma\right)+\frac{\kappa(s-1)\eta_{t}L}{2}\left(G+\sigma\right)\right),
ctsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡\displaystyle c_{t} =Î²2â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹L2â€‹(1+Îºâ€‹(sâˆ’1)â€‹Î·tâ€‹L2)2â€‹(G2+Ïƒ2).absentsuperscriptğ›½2ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿2superscript1ğœ…ğ‘ 1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿22superscriptğº2superscriptğœ2\displaystyle=\beta^{2}ps\eta_{t}\frac{s\eta_{t}L}{2}\left(1+\frac{\kappa(s-1)\eta_{t}L}{2}\right)^{2}\left(G^{2}+\sigma^{2}\right).

By the conditions on Î·tsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡\eta_{t} and Ïµitalic-Ïµ\epsilon, we have Ïµâ€‹B<0.8italic-Ïµğµ0.8\sqrt{\epsilon}B<0.8 and Î·tâ€‹sâ€‹Lâ‰¤Î·tâ€‹sâ€‹Lâ€‹Î²â€‹B2â‰¤0.1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ‘ ğ¿subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ‘ ğ¿ğ›½superscriptğµ20.1\eta_{t}sL\leq\eta_{t}sL\beta B^{2}\leq 0.1, and thus Îºâ‰¤e0.1âˆ’1âˆ’0.1(0.1)2/2ğœ…superscriptğ‘’0.110.1superscript0.122\kappa\leq\frac{e^{0.1}-1-0.1}{(0.1)^{2}/2}. Then we get

aÂ¯tâ‰¥C0â‹…Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ‰œat,subscriptÂ¯ğ‘ğ‘¡â‹…subscriptğ¶0ğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡â‰œsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡\bar{a}_{t}\geq{C_{0}}\cdot\beta ps\eta_{t}\triangleq a_{t},

where C0>0subscriptğ¶00C_{0}>0 is a constant. Hence,

ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(Î¸t+1)âˆ£â„±t]â‰¤Fâ€‹(Î¸t)âˆ’atâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22+btâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2+ct,ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡1subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡subscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡\mathbb{E}\left[F(\theta_{t+1})\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]\leq F(\theta_{t})-a_{t}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}+b_{t}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}+c_{t},
Finishing the proof for FedAvg:

Note that

â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2â‰¤aâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22+14â€‹a,âˆ€aâ‰¥0.formulae-sequencesubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2ğ‘superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2214ğ‘for-allğ‘0\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\leq a\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}+\frac{1}{4a},\quad\forall a\geq 0.

Picking a=at2â€‹btğ‘subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡2subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡a=\frac{a_{t}}{2b_{t}}, we get

ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(Î¸t+1)]â‰¤ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(Î¸t)]âˆ’at2â€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22+bt22â€‹at+ct.ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡1ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡2ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡22subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡\mathbb{E}\left[F(\theta_{t+1})\right]\leq\mathbb{E}\left[F(\theta_{t})\right]-\frac{a_{t}}{2}\mathbb{E}{\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}}+\frac{b_{t}^{2}}{2a_{t}}+c_{t}.

By telescoping sum, we get

ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(Î¸T+1)]â‰¤Fâ€‹(Î¸0)âˆ’12â€‹âˆ‘t=0Tatâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22+âˆ‘t=0T(bt22â€‹at+ct).ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘‡1ğ¹subscriptğœƒ012superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡22subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡\mathbb{E}\left[F(\theta_{T+1})\right]\leq F(\theta_{0})-\frac{1}{2}\sum_{t=0}^{T}a_{t}\mathbb{E}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}+\sum_{t=0}^{T}\left(\frac{b_{t}^{2}}{2a_{t}}+c_{t}\right).

Rearranging the terms, we deduce that

âˆ‘t=0TÎ·tâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22âˆ‘t=0TÎ·t=âˆ‘t=0Tatâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22âˆ‘t=0Tatâ‰¤2â€‹(Fâ€‹(Î¸0)âˆ’Fmin)âˆ‘t=0Tat+âˆ‘t=0T(bt2at+2â€‹ct)âˆ‘t=0Tat.superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡2ğ¹subscriptğœƒ0subscriptğ¹superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡2subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡2subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡\displaystyle\frac{\sum_{t=0}^{T}\eta_{t}\mathbb{E}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}}{\sum_{t=0}^{T}\eta_{t}}=\frac{\sum_{t=0}^{T}a_{t}\mathbb{E}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}}{\sum_{t=0}^{T}a_{t}}\leq\frac{2\left(F(\theta_{0})-F_{\min}\right)}{\sum_{t=0}^{T}a_{t}}+\frac{\sum_{t=0}^{T}\left(\frac{b_{t}^{2}}{a_{t}}+2c_{t}\right)}{\sum_{t=0}^{T}a_{t}}. (32)

Since at=C0â€‹Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·tsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡subscriptğ¶0ğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡a_{t}={C_{0}}\beta ps\eta_{t}, we have

bt2at+2â€‹ctsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡2subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡2subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡\displaystyle\frac{b_{t}^{2}}{a_{t}}+2c_{t} â‰¤Î²C0â€‹(pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·t)â€‹2â€‹(Ïµ+(C1â€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹L)2)â€‹(G+Ïƒ)2+Î²2â€‹(pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·t)â€‹(C2â€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹L)â€‹(G+Ïƒ)2absentğ›½subscriptğ¶0ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2italic-Ïµsuperscriptsubscriptğ¶1ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿2superscriptğºğœ2superscriptğ›½2ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptğ¶2ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿superscriptğºğœ2\displaystyle\leq\frac{\beta}{{C_{0}}}(ps\eta_{t})2(\epsilon+(C_{1}s\eta_{t}L)^{2})\left(G+\sigma\right)^{2}+\beta^{2}(ps\eta_{t})(C_{2}s\eta_{t}L)\left(G+\sigma\right)^{2}
â‰¤2â€‹ÏµC0â€‹(G+Ïƒ)2â€‹Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·t+C3â€‹Î²2â€‹pâ€‹s2â€‹Î·t2â€‹Lâ€‹(G+Ïƒ)2.absent2italic-Ïµsubscriptğ¶0superscriptğºğœ2ğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptğ¶3superscriptğ›½2ğ‘superscriptğ‘ 2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2ğ¿superscriptğºğœ2\displaystyle\leq\frac{2\epsilon}{{C_{0}}}\left(G+\sigma\right)^{2}\beta ps\eta_{t}+C_{3}\beta^{2}ps^{2}\eta_{t}^{2}L\left(G+\sigma\right)^{2}.

where C1=Îº2subscriptğ¶1ğœ…2C_{1}=\frac{\kappa}{2}, C2=(1+0.1â€‹Îº2)2subscriptğ¶2superscript10.1ğœ…22C_{2}=(1+\frac{0.1\kappa}{2})^{2}, and C3=C2+0.2â€‹C12C0â€‹Î²subscriptğ¶3subscriptğ¶20.2superscriptsubscriptğ¶12subscriptğ¶0ğ›½C_{3}=C_{2}+\frac{0.2C_{1}^{2}}{{C_{0}}\beta}. Hence,

âˆ‘t=0T(bt2at+2â€‹ct)âˆ‘t=0Tatâ‰¤(2â€‹ÏµC02+Î²â€‹Câ€²â€‹sâ€‹Lâ€‹âˆ‘t=0TÎ·t2âˆ‘t=0TÎ·t)â€‹(G+Ïƒ)2superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡2subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡2subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡2italic-Ïµsuperscriptsubscriptğ¶02ğ›½superscriptğ¶â€²ğ‘ ğ¿superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡superscriptğºğœ2\frac{\sum_{t=0}^{T}\left(\frac{b_{t}^{2}}{a_{t}}+2c_{t}\right)}{\sum_{t=0}^{T}a_{t}}\leq\left(\frac{2\epsilon}{C_{0}^{2}}+\beta\frac{C^{\prime}sL\sum_{t=0}^{T}\eta_{t}^{2}}{\sum_{t=0}^{T}\eta_{t}}\right)\left(G+\sigma\right)^{2}

for some universal constant Câ€².superscriptğ¶â€²C^{\prime}. Plugging the last displayed equation back toÂ (32) completes the proof ofÂ TheoremÂ 2 for FedAvg.

C.1.3 Proof for FedProx

The proof for the FedProx is similar, where we need an analogous result to LemmaÂ 1 under the additional condition that Î»minâ€‹(âˆ‡2â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸))â‰¥âˆ’Lâˆ’subscriptğœ†superscriptâˆ‡2subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒsubscriptğ¿\lambda_{\min}(\nabla^{2}\ell_{i,t}(\theta))\geq-L_{-} for all iğ‘–i. This condition is standard in analyzing the FedProx algorithm [LHY+20]. Note that the following result and proof can be readily extended to the case where the proximal problem (15) at each local step is solved inexactly (see e.g.Â [YL22, Lemma 5]).

Lemma 3.

Suppose Î»minâ€‹(âˆ‡2â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸))â‰¥âˆ’Lâˆ’subscriptğœ†superscriptâˆ‡2subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒsubscriptğ¿\lambda_{\min}(\nabla^{2}\ell_{i,t}(\theta))\geq-L_{-}. Then for Î·<1Lâˆ’ğœ‚1subscriptğ¿\eta<\frac{1}{L_{-}}, we have

â€–Î¸âˆ’ğ’«i,tâ€‹(Î¸;Î·)âˆ’Î·â€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸)â€–2â‰¤Î·21âˆ’Î·â€‹Lâˆ’â€‹Liâ€‹â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸)â€–2,âˆ€Î¸.subscriptnormğœƒsubscriptğ’«ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒğœ‚ğœ‚âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒ2superscriptğœ‚21ğœ‚subscriptğ¿subscriptğ¿ğ‘–subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒ2for-allğœƒ\left\|{\theta-{\mathcal{P}}_{i,t}(\theta;\eta)-\eta\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta)}\right\|_{2}\leq\frac{\eta^{2}}{1-\eta L_{-}}L_{i}\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta)}\right\|_{2},\quad\forall\theta.
Proof.

For Î·<1Lâˆ’ğœ‚1subscriptğ¿\eta<\frac{1}{L_{-}}, the local objective function â„“~i,tâ€‹(z)â‰œâ„“i,tâ€‹(z)+12â€‹Î·â€‹â€–zâˆ’Î¸â€–22â‰œsubscript~â„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘§subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘§12ğœ‚superscriptsubscriptnormğ‘§ğœƒ22\widetilde{\ell}_{i,t}(z)\triangleq\ell_{i,t}(z)+\frac{1}{2\eta}\left\|{z-\theta}\right\|_{2}^{2} as given in (15) is (1/Î·âˆ’Lâˆ’)1ğœ‚subscriptğ¿(1/\eta-L_{-})-strongly convex in view of the definitionÂ (9). Hence, the optimization program (15) has a unique minimizer. By the first-order optimality condition,

Î¸âˆ’ğ’«i,tâ€‹(Î¸,Î·)=Î·â€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(ğ’«i,tâ€‹(Î¸,Î·)).ğœƒsubscriptğ’«ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒğœ‚ğœ‚âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğ’«ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒğœ‚\theta-{\mathcal{P}}_{i,t}(\theta,\eta)=\eta\nabla\ell_{i,t}({\mathcal{P}}_{i,t}(\theta,\eta)).

By the (1Î·âˆ’Lâˆ’)1ğœ‚subscriptğ¿(\frac{1}{\eta}-L_{-})-strong convexity of the objective function â„“~i,tâ€‹(z)subscript~â„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘§\widetilde{\ell}_{i,t}(z), we have

â€–ğ’«i,tâ€‹(Î¸,Î·)âˆ’Î¸â€–2â‰¤11Î·âˆ’Lâˆ’â€‹â€–âˆ‡â„“~i,tâ€‹(ğ’«i,tâ€‹(Î¸,Î·))âˆ’âˆ‡â„“~i,tâ€‹(Î¸)â€–2=11Î·âˆ’Lâˆ’â€‹â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸)â€–2,subscriptnormsubscriptğ’«ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒğœ‚ğœƒ211ğœ‚subscriptğ¿subscriptnormâˆ‡subscript~â„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğ’«ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒğœ‚âˆ‡subscript~â„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒ211ğœ‚subscriptğ¿subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒ2\left\|{{\mathcal{P}}_{i,t}(\theta,\eta)-\theta}\right\|_{2}\leq\frac{1}{\frac{1}{\eta}-L_{-}}\left\|{\nabla\widetilde{\ell}_{i,t}({\mathcal{P}}_{i,t}(\theta,\eta))-\nabla\widetilde{\ell}_{i,t}(\theta)}\right\|_{2}=\frac{1}{\frac{1}{\eta}-L_{-}}\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta)}\right\|_{2},

where we used the facts that âˆ‡â„“~i,tâ€‹(ğ’«i,tâ€‹(Î¸,Î·))=0âˆ‡subscript~â„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğ’«ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒğœ‚0\nabla\widetilde{\ell}_{i,t}({\mathcal{P}}_{i,t}(\theta,\eta))=0 and âˆ‡â„“~i,tâ€‹(Î¸)=âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸)âˆ‡subscript~â„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒ\nabla\widetilde{\ell}_{i,t}(\theta)=\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta). Therefore, by the smoothness of â„“i,tsubscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡\ell_{i,t}, we have

â€–Î¸âˆ’ğ’«i,tâ€‹(Î¸,Î·)âˆ’Î·â€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸)â€–2subscriptnormğœƒsubscriptğ’«ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒğœ‚ğœ‚âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒ2\displaystyle\left\|{\theta-{\mathcal{P}}_{i,t}(\theta,\eta)-\eta\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta)}\right\|_{2} =Î·â€‹â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(ğ’«i,tâ€‹(Î¸,Î·))âˆ’âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸)â€–2â‰¤Î·â€‹Liâ€‹â€–ğ’«i,tâ€‹(Î¸,Î·)âˆ’Î¸â€–2absentğœ‚subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğ’«ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒğœ‚âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒ2ğœ‚subscriptğ¿ğ‘–subscriptnormsubscriptğ’«ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒğœ‚ğœƒ2\displaystyle=\eta\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}({\mathcal{P}}_{i,t}(\theta,\eta))-\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta)}\right\|_{2}\leq\eta L_{i}\left\|{{\mathcal{P}}_{i,t}(\theta,\eta)-\theta}\right\|_{2}
â‰¤Î·2â€‹Li1âˆ’Î·â€‹Lâˆ’â€‹â€–âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸)â€–2.âˆabsentsuperscriptğœ‚2subscriptğ¿ğ‘–1ğœ‚subscriptğ¿subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒ2\displaystyle\leq\frac{\eta^{2}L_{i}}{1-\eta L_{-}}\left\|{\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta)}\right\|_{2}.\qed

The remaining analysis is similar to the FedAvg update rule. In particular, following the previous arguments, we upper bound the right-hand side of (16) by

ğ”¼â€‹[âŸ¨âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t),Î¸t+1âˆ’Î¸tâŸ©âˆ£â„±t]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡1subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\left\langle\nabla F(\theta_{t}),\theta_{t+1}-\theta_{t}\right\rangle\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right] â‰¤âˆ’Î²â€‹pâ€‹Î·tâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22+Î²â€‹pâ€‹Î·tâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2â€‹Ïµâ€‹(Bâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2+G+Ïƒ)absentğ›½ğ‘subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22ğ›½ğ‘subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2italic-Ïµğµsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2ğºğœ\displaystyle\leq-\beta p\eta_{t}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}+\beta p\eta_{t}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\sqrt{\epsilon}\left(B\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}+G+\sigma\right)
+Î²â€‹pâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2â€‹Î·t21âˆ’Î·tâ€‹Lâˆ’â€‹Lâ€‹(Bâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2+G+Ïƒ),ğ›½ğ‘subscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡21subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptğ¿ğ¿ğµsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2ğºğœ\displaystyle\qquad+\beta p\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\frac{\eta_{t}^{2}}{1-\eta_{t}L_{-}}L\left(B\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}+G+\sigma\right), (33)
ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î¸t+1âˆ’Î¸tâ€–22âˆ£â„±t]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsuperscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡1subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|{\theta_{t+1}-\theta_{t}}\right\|_{2}^{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right] â‰¤Î²2â€‹Î·t2â€‹(1+Î·tâ€‹L1âˆ’Î·â€‹Lâˆ’)2â€‹pâ€‹(B2â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸)â€–22+G2+Ïƒ2).absentsuperscriptğ›½2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2superscript1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿1ğœ‚subscriptğ¿2ğ‘superscriptğµ2superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹ğœƒ22superscriptğº2superscriptğœ2\displaystyle\leq\beta^{2}\eta_{t}^{2}\left(1+\frac{\eta_{t}L}{1-\eta L_{-}}\right)^{2}p\left(B^{2}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta)}\right\|_{2}^{2}+G^{2}+\sigma^{2}\right). (34)

Then, we get

ğ”¼â€‹[Fâ€‹(Î¸t+1)âˆ£â„±t]â‰¤Fâ€‹(Î¸t)âˆ’aÂ¯tâ€²â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22+btâ€²â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2+ctâ€²,ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡1subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptÂ¯ğ‘ğ‘¡â€²superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡â€²subscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡â€²\mathbb{E}\left[F(\theta_{t+1})\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]\leq F(\theta_{t})-\bar{a}_{t}^{\prime}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}+b_{t}^{\prime}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}+c_{t}^{\prime},

where

aÂ¯tâ€²superscriptsubscriptÂ¯ğ‘ğ‘¡â€²\displaystyle\bar{a}_{t}^{\prime} =Î²â€‹pâ€‹Î·tâ€‹(1âˆ’Ïµâ€‹Bâˆ’Î·tâ€‹L1âˆ’Î·tâ€‹Lâˆ’â€‹Bâˆ’Î²â€‹Î·tâ€‹L2â€‹(1+Î·tâ€‹L1âˆ’Î·tâ€‹Lâˆ’)2â€‹B2),absentğ›½ğ‘subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡1italic-Ïµğµsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptğ¿ğµğ›½subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿2superscript1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptğ¿2superscriptğµ2\displaystyle=\beta p\eta_{t}\left(1-\sqrt{\epsilon}B-\frac{\eta_{t}L}{1-\eta_{t}L_{-}}B-\beta\frac{\eta_{t}L}{2}\left(1+\frac{\eta_{t}L}{1-\eta_{t}L_{-}}\right)^{2}B^{2}\right),
btâ€²superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡â€²\displaystyle b_{t}^{\prime} =Î²â€‹pâ€‹Î·tâ€‹(Ïµâ€‹(G+Ïƒ)+Î·tâ€‹L1âˆ’Î·tâ€‹Lâˆ’â€‹(G+Ïƒ)),absentğ›½ğ‘subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡italic-Ïµğºğœsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptğ¿ğºğœ\displaystyle=\beta p\eta_{t}\left(\sqrt{\epsilon}\left(G+\sigma\right)+\frac{\eta_{t}L}{1-\eta_{t}L_{-}}\left(G+\sigma\right)\right),
ctâ€²superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡â€²\displaystyle c_{t}^{\prime} =Î²2â€‹pâ€‹Î·tâ€‹Î·tâ€‹L2â€‹(1+Î·tâ€‹L1âˆ’Î·tâ€‹Lâˆ’)2â€‹(G2+Ïƒ2).absentsuperscriptğ›½2ğ‘subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿2superscript1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptğ¿2superscriptğº2superscriptğœ2\displaystyle=\beta^{2}p\eta_{t}\frac{\eta_{t}L}{2}\left(1+\frac{\eta_{t}L}{1-\eta_{t}L_{-}}\right)^{2}\left(G^{2}+\sigma^{2}\right).

By the conditions on Î·tsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡\eta_{t} and Ïµitalic-Ïµ\epsilon, we have Ïµâ€‹Bâ‰¤0.1italic-Ïµğµ0.1\sqrt{\epsilon}B\leq 0.1, Î·tâ€‹Lâ‰¤Î·tâ€‹Î²â€‹Lâ€‹B2â‰¤0.1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ›½ğ¿superscriptğµ20.1\eta_{t}L\leq\eta_{t}\beta LB^{2}\leq 0.1, and Î·tâ€‹Lâˆ’â‰¤0.1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptğ¿0.1\eta_{t}L_{-}\leq 0.1, and thus aÂ¯tâ€²â‰¥C0â€²â‹…Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ‰œatâ€²superscriptsubscriptÂ¯ğ‘ğ‘¡â€²â‹…superscriptsubscriptğ¶0â€²ğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡â‰œsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡â€²\bar{a}_{t}^{\prime}\geq C_{0}^{\prime}\cdot\beta ps\eta_{t}\triangleq a_{t}^{\prime}, where C0â€²â‰ˆ0.73superscriptsubscriptğ¶0â€²0.73C_{0}^{\prime}\approx 0.73. Following a similar analysis, we get

âˆ‘t=0TÎ·tâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22âˆ‘t=0TÎ·t=âˆ‘t=0Tatâ€²â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–22âˆ‘t=0Tatâ€²superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡â€²superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡â€²\displaystyle\frac{\sum_{t=0}^{T}\eta_{t}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}}{\sum_{t=0}^{T}\eta_{t}}=\frac{\sum_{t=0}^{T}a_{t}^{\prime}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}^{2}}{\sum_{t=0}^{T}a_{t}^{\prime}} â‰¤2â€‹(Fâ€‹(Î¸0)âˆ’Fmin)âˆ‘t=0Tatâ€²+âˆ‘t=0T(btâ€²â£2atâ€²+2â€‹ctâ€²)âˆ‘t=0Tatâ€²absent2ğ¹subscriptğœƒ0subscriptğ¹superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡â€²superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡â€²2superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡â€²2superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡â€²superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡â€²\displaystyle\leq\frac{2\left(F(\theta_{0})-F_{\min}\right)}{\sum_{t=0}^{T}a_{t}^{\prime}}+\frac{\sum_{t=0}^{T}\left(\frac{b_{t}^{\prime 2}}{a_{t}^{\prime}}+2c_{t}^{\prime}\right)}{\sum_{t=0}^{T}a_{t}^{\prime}}
â‰¤2â€‹(Fâ€‹(Î¸0)âˆ’Fmin)âˆ‘t=0Tatâ€²+(2â€‹ÏµC0â€²â£2+Î²â€‹câ€‹Lâ€‹âˆ‘t=0TÎ·t2âˆ‘t=0TÎ·t)â€‹(G+Ïƒ)2.absent2ğ¹subscriptğœƒ0subscriptğ¹superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡â€²2italic-Ïµsuperscriptsubscriptğ¶0â€²2ğ›½ğ‘ğ¿superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2superscriptsubscriptğ‘¡0ğ‘‡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡superscriptğºğœ2\displaystyle\leq\frac{2\left(F(\theta_{0})-F_{\min}\right)}{\sum_{t=0}^{T}a_{t}^{\prime}}+\left(\frac{2\epsilon}{C_{0}^{\prime 2}}+\beta\frac{cL\sum_{t=0}^{T}\eta_{t}^{2}}{\sum_{t=0}^{T}\eta_{t}}\right)\left(G+\sigma\right)^{2}.

C.2 Proof of TheoremÂ 3

Proof of TheoremÂ 3.

We first consider FedAvg. The proof is in the same spirit as that in the non-convex case. The major difference is that in the strongly-convex setting, we study the iterates of Î”tâ‰œâ€–Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—â€–2â‰œsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡subscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒ2\Delta_{t}\triangleq\left\|{\theta_{t}-\theta^{*}}\right\|_{2}, for which we have

Î”t+12superscriptsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡12\displaystyle\Delta_{t+1}^{2} =â€–Î¸t+1âˆ’Î¸t+Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—â€–22absentsuperscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡1subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒ22\displaystyle=\left\|{\theta_{t+1}-\theta_{t}+\theta_{t}-\theta^{*}}\right\|_{2}^{2}
=Î”t2+2â€‹âŸ¨Î¸t+1âˆ’Î¸t,Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—âŸ©+â€–Î¸t+1âˆ’Î¸tâ€–22.absentsuperscriptsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡22subscriptğœƒğ‘¡1subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒsuperscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡1subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22\displaystyle=\Delta_{t}^{2}+2\left\langle\theta_{t+1}-\theta_{t},\theta_{t}-\theta^{*}\right\rangle+\left\|{\theta_{t+1}-\theta_{t}}\right\|_{2}^{2}. (35)

Let us first analyze the drift term âŸ¨Î¸t+1âˆ’Î¸t,Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—âŸ©subscriptğœƒğ‘¡1subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒ\left\langle\theta_{t+1}-\theta_{t},\theta_{t}-\theta^{*}\right\rangle. PluggingÂ (17), we get that

âŸ¨Î¸t+1âˆ’Î¸t,Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—âŸ©subscriptğœƒğ‘¡1subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒ\displaystyle\left\langle\theta_{t+1}-\theta_{t},\theta_{t}-\theta^{*}\right\rangle =âˆ’Î²â€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹âŸ¨Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—,âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®twiâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)âŸ©âŸ(I)absentğ›½ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptâŸsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒsubscriptğ‘–subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡I\displaystyle=-\beta s\eta_{t}\underbrace{\left\langle\theta_{t}-\theta^{*},\sum_{i\in{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})\right\rangle}_{\rm(I)}
+Î²â€‹âŸ¨Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—,âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®twiâ€‹(ğ’¢i,tsâ€‹(Î¸t;Î·t)âˆ’Î¸t+sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t))âŸ©âŸ(II).ğ›½subscriptâŸsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒsubscriptğ‘–subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ’¢ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğ‘ subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡II\displaystyle\qquad+\beta\underbrace{\left\langle\theta_{t}-\theta^{*},\sum_{i\in{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}({\mathcal{G}}_{i,t}^{s}(\theta_{t};\eta_{t})-\theta_{t}+s\eta_{t}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t}))\right\rangle}_{\rm(II)}.

For term (I)I\rm(I),

(I)I\displaystyle\mathrm{(I)} =âŸ¨Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—,âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~twiâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)âŸ©âˆ’âŸ¨Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—,âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~t/ğ’®twiâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)âŸ©absentsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒsubscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒsubscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡\displaystyle=\left\langle\theta_{t}-\theta^{*},\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})\right\rangle-\left\langle\theta_{t}-\theta^{*},\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}/{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})\right\rangle
â‰¥âŸ¨Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—,âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~twiâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)âŸ©âˆ’â€–Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—â€–2â€‹â€–âˆ‘iâˆˆğ’®~t/ğ’®twiâ€‹âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2absentsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒsubscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒ2subscriptnormsubscriptğ‘–subscript~ğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ’®ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2\displaystyle\geq\left\langle\theta_{t}-\theta^{*},\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})\right\rangle-\left\|{\theta_{t}-\theta^{*}}\right\|_{2}\left\|{\sum_{i\in\widetilde{\mathcal{S}}_{t}/{\mathcal{S}}_{t}}w_{i}\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}

Then, applyingÂ (C.1.1) andÂ LemmaÂ 2 yields

ğ”¼â€‹[(I)âˆ£â„±t]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalIsubscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\mathrm{(I)}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right] â‰¥pâ€‹(âŸ¨Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—,âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)âŸ©âˆ’â€–Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—â€–2â€‹Ïµâ€‹(Bâ€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2+G+Ïƒ)).absentğ‘subscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒ2italic-Ïµğµsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2ğºğœ\displaystyle\geq p\left(\left\langle\theta_{t}-\theta^{*},\nabla F(\theta_{t})\right\rangle-\left\|{\theta_{t}-\theta^{*}}\right\|_{2}\sqrt{\epsilon}\left(B\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}+G+\sigma\right)\right). (36)

By Î¼ğœ‡\mu-strong convexity, we have

âŸ¨Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—,âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)âŸ©â‰¥Î¼â€‹â€–Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—â€–22.subscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡ğœ‡superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒ22\left\langle\theta_{t}-\theta^{*},\nabla F(\theta_{t})\right\rangle\geq\mu\left\|{\theta_{t}-\theta^{*}}\right\|_{2}^{2}.

By Lğ¿L-smoothness, we have

â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸t)â€–2â‰¤Lâ€‹â€–Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—â€–2subscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹subscriptğœƒğ‘¡2ğ¿subscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒ2\left\|{\nabla F(\theta_{t})}\right\|_{2}\leq L\left\|{\theta_{t}-\theta^{*}}\right\|_{2}

It follows that

ğ”¼â€‹[(I)âˆ£â„±t]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalIsubscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\mathrm{(I)}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right] â‰¥pâ€‹(Î¼â€‹â€–Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—â€–22âˆ’â€–Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—â€–2â€‹Ïµâ€‹(Bâ€‹Lâ€‹â€–Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—â€–2+G+Ïƒ)).absentğ‘ğœ‡superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒ22subscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒ2italic-Ïµğµğ¿subscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒ2ğºğœ\displaystyle\geq p\left(\mu\left\|{\theta_{t}-\theta^{*}}\right\|_{2}^{2}-\left\|{\theta_{t}-\theta^{*}}\right\|_{2}\sqrt{\epsilon}\left(BL\left\|{\theta_{t}-\theta^{*}}\right\|_{2}+G+\sigma\right)\right). (37)

For term (II)II\rm(II), analogous toÂ (29), applyingÂ LemmaÂ 1 andÂ (28), we get

ğ”¼â€‹[(II)âˆ£â„±t]â‰¤pâ€‹â€–Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—â€–2â€‹Îºâ€‹Î·t2â€‹Lâ€‹(s2)â€‹(Bâ€‹Lâ€‹â€–Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—â€–2+G+Ïƒ)ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalIIsubscriptâ„±ğ‘¡ğ‘subscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒ2ğœ…superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2ğ¿binomialğ‘ 2ğµğ¿subscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒ2ğºğœ\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\mathrm{(II)}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]\leq p\left\|{\theta_{t}-\theta^{*}}\right\|_{2}\kappa\eta_{t}^{2}L\binom{s}{2}\left(BL\left\|{\theta_{t}-\theta^{*}}\right\|_{2}+G+\sigma\right) (38)

Combining the last two displayed equations yields that

ğ”¼â€‹[âŸ¨Î¸t+1âˆ’Î¸t,Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—âŸ©âˆ£â„±t]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡1subscriptğœƒğ‘¡subscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒâˆ—subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\left\langle\theta_{t+1}-\theta_{t},\theta_{t}-\theta^{\ast}\right\rangle\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]
â‰¤âˆ’Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹Î¼â€‹â€–Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—â€–22+Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹â€–Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—â€–2â€‹Ïµâ€‹(Bâ€‹Lâ€‹â€–Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—â€–2+G+Ïƒ)absentğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğœ‡superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒ22ğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒ2italic-Ïµğµğ¿subscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒ2ğºğœ\displaystyle\leq-\beta ps\eta_{t}\mu\left\|{\theta_{t}-\theta^{*}}\right\|_{2}^{2}+\beta ps\eta_{t}\left\|{\theta_{t}-\theta^{*}}\right\|_{2}\sqrt{\epsilon}\left(BL\left\|{\theta_{t}-\theta^{*}}\right\|_{2}+G+\sigma\right)
+Î²â€‹pâ€‹â€–Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—â€–2â€‹Îºâ€‹Î·t2â€‹Lâ€‹(s2)â€‹(Bâ€‹Lâ€‹â€–Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—â€–2+G+Ïƒ).ğ›½ğ‘subscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒ2ğœ…superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2ğ¿binomialğ‘ 2ğµğ¿subscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒ2ğºğœ\displaystyle\qquad+\beta p\left\|{\theta_{t}-\theta^{*}}\right\|_{2}\kappa\eta_{t}^{2}L\binom{s}{2}\left(BL\left\|{\theta_{t}-\theta^{*}}\right\|_{2}+G+\sigma\right). (39)

For the quadratic term, analogous to (31), we have

ğ”¼â€‹[â€–Î¸t+1âˆ’Î¸tâ€–22âˆ£â„±t]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsuperscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡1subscriptğœƒğ‘¡22subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|{\theta_{t+1}-\theta_{t}}\right\|_{2}^{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right] â‰¤Î²2â€‹s2â€‹Î·t2â€‹(1+Îºâ€‹Î·tâ€‹Lâ€‹(sâˆ’1)/2)2â€‹pâ€‹(B2â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸)â€–22+G2+Ïƒ2)absentsuperscriptğ›½2superscriptğ‘ 2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2superscript1ğœ…subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿ğ‘ 122ğ‘superscriptğµ2superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹ğœƒ22superscriptğº2superscriptğœ2\displaystyle\leq\beta^{2}s^{2}\eta_{t}^{2}\left(1+\kappa\eta_{t}L(s-1)/2\right)^{2}p\left(B^{2}\left\|{\nabla F(\theta)}\right\|_{2}^{2}+G^{2}+\sigma^{2}\right)
â‰¤Î²2â€‹s2â€‹Î·t2â€‹(1+Îºâ€‹Î·tâ€‹Lâ€‹(sâˆ’1)/2)2â€‹pâ€‹(B2â€‹L2â€‹â€–Î¸tâˆ’Î¸âˆ—â€–22+G2+Ïƒ2).absentsuperscriptğ›½2superscriptğ‘ 2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2superscript1ğœ…subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿ğ‘ 122ğ‘superscriptğµ2superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptnormsubscriptğœƒğ‘¡superscriptğœƒ22superscriptğº2superscriptğœ2\displaystyle\leq\beta^{2}s^{2}\eta_{t}^{2}\left(1+\kappa\eta_{t}L(s-1)/2\right)^{2}p\left(B^{2}L^{2}\left\|{\theta_{t}-\theta^{*}}\right\|_{2}^{2}+G^{2}+\sigma^{2}\right).

Combining the last two displayed equations and plugging them intoÂ (35) yields that

ğ”¼â€‹[Î”t+12âˆ£â„±t]ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsuperscriptsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡12subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\Delta_{t+1}^{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right] â‰¤Î”t2âˆ’Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹Î¼â€‹Î”t2+Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹Î”tâ€‹Ïµâ€‹(Bâ€‹Lâ€‹Î”t+G+Ïƒ)absentsuperscriptsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡2ğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğœ‡superscriptsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡2ğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptÎ”ğ‘¡italic-Ïµğµğ¿subscriptÎ”ğ‘¡ğºğœ\displaystyle\leq\Delta_{t}^{2}-\beta ps\eta_{t}\mu\Delta_{t}^{2}+\beta ps\eta_{t}\Delta_{t}\sqrt{\epsilon}\left(BL\Delta_{t}+G+\sigma\right)
+Î²â€‹pâ€‹Î”tâ€‹Îºâ€‹Î·t2â€‹Lâ€‹(s2)â€‹(Bâ€‹Lâ€‹Î”t+G+Ïƒ)ğ›½ğ‘subscriptÎ”ğ‘¡ğœ…superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2ğ¿binomialğ‘ 2ğµğ¿subscriptÎ”ğ‘¡ğºğœ\displaystyle\qquad+\beta p\Delta_{t}\kappa\eta_{t}^{2}L\binom{s}{2}\left(BL\Delta_{t}+G+\sigma\right)
+Î²2â€‹s2â€‹Î·t2â€‹(1+Îºâ€‹Î·tâ€‹Lâ€‹(sâˆ’1)/2)2â€‹pâ€‹(B2â€‹L2â€‹Î”t2+G2+Ïƒ2).superscriptğ›½2superscriptğ‘ 2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2superscript1ğœ…subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿ğ‘ 122ğ‘superscriptğµ2superscriptğ¿2superscriptsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡2superscriptğº2superscriptğœ2\displaystyle\qquad+\beta^{2}s^{2}\eta_{t}^{2}\left(1+\kappa\eta_{t}L(s-1)/2\right)^{2}p\left(B^{2}L^{2}\Delta_{t}^{2}+G^{2}+\sigma^{2}\right).

In particular,

ğ”¼â€‹[Î”t+12âˆ£â„±t]â‰¤(1âˆ’at)â€‹Î”t2+btâ€‹Î”t+ct,ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsuperscriptsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡12subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡1subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡2subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡subscriptÎ”ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡\mathbb{E}\left[\Delta_{t+1}^{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]\leq(1-a_{t})\Delta_{t}^{2}+b_{t}\Delta_{t}+c_{t},

where

atsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡\displaystyle a_{t} =Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹(Î¼âˆ’Ïµâ€‹Bâ€‹Lâˆ’Î·tâ€‹Îºâ€‹sâˆ’12â€‹Bâ€‹L2+Î²â€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹(1+Îºâ€‹Î·tâ€‹Lâ€‹(sâˆ’1)/2)2â€‹B2â€‹L2)absentğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğœ‡italic-Ïµğµğ¿subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğœ…ğ‘ 12ğµsuperscriptğ¿2ğ›½ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡superscript1ğœ…subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿ğ‘ 122superscriptğµ2superscriptğ¿2\displaystyle=\beta ps\eta_{t}\left(\mu-\sqrt{\epsilon}BL-\eta_{t}\kappa\frac{s-1}{2}BL^{2}+\beta s\eta_{t}\left(1+\kappa\eta_{t}L(s-1)/2\right)^{2}B^{2}L^{2}\right)
btsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡\displaystyle b_{t} =Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹(Ïµâ€‹(G+Ïƒ)+Îºâ€‹(sâˆ’1)â€‹Î·tâ€‹L2â€‹(G+Ïƒ)),absentğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡italic-Ïµğºğœğœ…ğ‘ 1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿2ğºğœ\displaystyle=\beta ps\eta_{t}\left(\sqrt{\epsilon}\left(G+\sigma\right)+\frac{\kappa(s-1)\eta_{t}L}{2}\left(G+\sigma\right)\right),
ctsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡\displaystyle c_{t} =Î²2â€‹pâ€‹s2â€‹Î·t2â€‹(1+Îºâ€‹(sâˆ’1)â€‹Î·tâ€‹L2)2â€‹(G2+Ïƒ2).absentsuperscriptğ›½2ğ‘superscriptğ‘ 2subscriptsuperscriptğœ‚2ğ‘¡superscript1ğœ…ğ‘ 1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿22superscriptğº2superscriptğœ2\displaystyle=\beta^{2}ps^{2}\eta^{2}_{t}\left(1+\frac{\kappa(s-1)\eta_{t}L}{2}\right)^{2}\left(G^{2}+\sigma^{2}\right).

Using the fact that Î”tâ‰¤at2â€‹btâ€‹Î”t2+bt2â€‹at,subscriptÎ”ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡2subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡2subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡2subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡\Delta_{t}\leq\frac{a_{t}}{2b_{t}}\Delta_{t}^{2}+\frac{b_{t}}{2a_{t}}, and taking expectation over â„±tsubscriptâ„±ğ‘¡{\mathcal{F}}_{t} we get that

ğ”¼â€‹[Î”t+12]â‰¤(1âˆ’at2)â€‹ğ”¼â€‹[Î”t2]+bt22â€‹at+ct,ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡121subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡2ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡2superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡22subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡\mathbb{E}\left[\Delta_{t+1}^{2}\right]\leq\left(1-\frac{a_{t}}{2}\right)\mathbb{E}\left[\Delta_{t}^{2}\right]+\frac{b_{t}^{2}}{2a_{t}}+c_{t},

Unrolling the recursion, we deduce that

ğ”¼â€‹[Î”t2]ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\Delta_{t}^{2}\right] â‰¤âˆÏ„=0tâˆ’1(1âˆ’aÏ„2)â€‹Î”0+âˆ‘Ï„=0tâˆ’1(bÏ„22â€‹aÏ„+cÏ„)â€‹âˆÏ„â€²=Ï„+1tâˆ’1(1âˆ’aÏ„â€²2).absentsuperscriptsubscriptproductğœ0ğ‘¡11subscriptğ‘ğœ2subscriptÎ”0superscriptsubscriptğœ0ğ‘¡1superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğœ22subscriptğ‘ğœsubscriptğ‘ğœsuperscriptsubscriptproductsuperscriptğœâ€²ğœ1ğ‘¡11subscriptğ‘superscriptğœâ€²2\displaystyle\leq\prod_{\tau=0}^{t-1}\left(1-\frac{a_{\tau}}{2}\right)\Delta_{0}+\sum_{\tau=0}^{t-1}\left(\frac{b_{\tau}^{2}}{2a_{\tau}}+c_{\tau}\right)\prod_{\tau^{\prime}=\tau+1}^{t-1}\left(1-\frac{a_{\tau^{\prime}}}{2}\right).

Choose Î·t=Î¸t+Î³subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğœƒğ‘¡ğ›¾\eta_{t}=\frac{\theta}{t+\gamma} for some constant Î¸ğœƒ\theta and sufficiently large constant Î³ğ›¾\gamma so that Î·tâ‰¤Î¼10â€‹Î²â€‹sâ€‹L2â€‹B2subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğœ‡10ğ›½ğ‘ superscriptğ¿2superscriptğµ2\eta_{t}\leq\frac{\mu}{10\beta sL^{2}B^{2}}. Therefore, Î·tâ€‹Î²â€‹sâ€‹L2â€‹B2â‰¤0.1â€‹Î¼subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ›½ğ‘ superscriptğ¿2superscriptğµ20.1ğœ‡\eta_{t}\beta sL^{2}B^{2}\leq 0.1\mu and Î·tâ€‹sâ€‹Lâ‰¤0.1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ‘ ğ¿0.1\eta_{t}sL\leq 0.1. Furthermore, Îºâ‰¤e0.1âˆ’1âˆ’0.1(0.1)2/2ğœ…superscriptğ‘’0.110.1superscript0.122\kappa\leq\frac{e^{0.1}-1-0.1}{(0.1)^{2}/2}. By the standing assumption, Ïµâ€‹Bâ‰¤0.8â€‹Î¼/Litalic-Ïµğµ0.8ğœ‡ğ¿\sqrt{\epsilon}B\leq 0.8\mu/L. Hence, atâ‰¥C0â€‹Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹Î¼.subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡subscriptğ¶0ğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğœ‡a_{t}\geq C_{0}\beta ps\eta_{t}\mu. for some constant C0>0.subscriptğ¶00C_{0}>0. Let Ï=C0â€‹Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î¸â€‹Î¼2>1ğœŒsubscriptğ¶0ğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ ğœƒğœ‡21\rho=\frac{C_{0}\beta ps\theta\mu}{2}>1. Then it follows that

âˆÏ„â€²=Ï„tâˆ’1(1âˆ’aÏ„â€²2)â‰¤expâ¡(âˆ’12â€‹âˆ‘Ï„â€²=Ï„tâˆ’1aÏ„â€²)â‰¤expâ¡(âˆ’Ïâ€‹âˆ‘Ï„â€²=Ï„tâˆ’11Ï„â€²+Î³)â‰¤expâ¡(âˆ’Ïâ€‹logâ¡(t+Î³Ï„+Î³)),superscriptsubscriptproductsuperscriptğœâ€²ğœğ‘¡11subscriptğ‘superscriptğœâ€²212superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptğœâ€²ğœğ‘¡1subscriptğ‘superscriptğœâ€²ğœŒsuperscriptsubscriptsuperscriptğœâ€²ğœğ‘¡11superscriptğœâ€²ğ›¾ğœŒğ‘¡ğ›¾ğœğ›¾\prod_{\tau^{\prime}=\tau}^{t-1}\left(1-\frac{a_{\tau^{\prime}}}{2}\right)\leq\exp\left(-\frac{1}{2}\sum_{\tau^{\prime}=\tau}^{t-1}a_{\tau^{\prime}}\right)\leq\exp\left(-\rho\sum_{\tau^{\prime}=\tau}^{t-1}\frac{1}{\tau^{\prime}+\gamma}\right)\leq\exp\left(-\rho\log\left(\frac{t+\gamma}{\tau+\gamma}\right)\right),

where the last inequality holds because âˆ‘Ï„â€²=Ï„tâˆ’11Ï„â€²+Î³â‰¥âˆ«Ï„+Î³t+Î³1xâ€‹dx=logâ¡t+Î³Ï„+Î³.superscriptsubscriptsuperscriptğœâ€²ğœğ‘¡11superscriptğœâ€²ğ›¾superscriptsubscriptğœğ›¾ğ‘¡ğ›¾1ğ‘¥differential-dğ‘¥ğ‘¡ğ›¾ğœğ›¾\sum_{\tau^{\prime}=\tau}^{t-1}\frac{1}{\tau^{\prime}+\gamma}\geq\int_{\tau+\gamma}^{t+\gamma}\frac{1}{x}{\rm d}x=\log\frac{t+\gamma}{\tau+\gamma}. Moreover, atâ‰¤Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹Î¼â‰¤Î¼2â€‹p10â€‹L2â€‹B2â‰¤0.1subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡ğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğœ‡superscriptğœ‡2ğ‘10superscriptğ¿2superscriptğµ20.1a_{t}\leq\beta ps\eta_{t}\mu\leq\frac{\mu^{2}p}{10L^{2}B^{2}}\leq 0.1, so that 1âˆ’at/2â‰¥0.951subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡20.951-a_{t}/2\geq 0.95. Hence,

11âˆ’at/2â€‹(bt22â€‹at+ct)11subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡2superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡22subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘ğ‘¡\displaystyle\frac{1}{1-a_{t}/2}\left(\frac{b_{t}^{2}}{2a_{t}}+c_{t}\right) â‰¤Î²â€‹(pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·t)2â€‹2â€‹(Ïµ+(C1â€‹sâ€‹Lâ€‹Î·t)2)0.95â‹…2â€‹C0â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·tâ€‹Î¼â€‹(G+Ïƒ)2+C2â€‹Î²2â€‹pâ€‹s2â€‹Î·t2â€‹(G+Ïƒ)2absentğ›½superscriptğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡22italic-Ïµsuperscriptsubscriptğ¶1ğ‘ ğ¿subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2â‹…0.952subscriptğ¶0ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğœ‡superscriptğºğœ2subscriptğ¶2superscriptğ›½2ğ‘superscriptğ‘ 2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2superscriptğºğœ2\displaystyle\leq\frac{\beta(ps\eta_{t})^{2}2(\epsilon+(C_{1}sL\eta_{t})^{2})}{0.95\cdot 2C_{0}ps\eta_{t}\mu}\left(G+\sigma\right)^{2}+C_{2}\beta^{2}ps^{2}\eta_{t}^{2}\left(G+\sigma\right)^{2}
â‰¤Câ€²â€‹Ïµâ€‹(G+Ïƒ)2â€‹Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î·t/Î¼+Câ€²â€‹Î²2â€‹pâ€‹s2â€‹Î·t2â€‹(G+Ïƒ)2,absentsuperscriptğ¶â€²italic-Ïµsuperscriptğºğœ2ğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğœ‡superscriptğ¶â€²superscriptğ›½2ğ‘superscriptğ‘ 2superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2superscriptğºğœ2\displaystyle\leq C^{\prime}\epsilon\left(G+\sigma\right)^{2}\beta ps\eta_{t}/\mu+C^{\prime}\beta^{2}ps^{2}\eta_{t}^{2}\left(G+\sigma\right)^{2},

where C1,C2,Câ€²subscriptğ¶1subscriptğ¶2superscriptğ¶â€²C_{1},C_{2},C^{\prime} are some universal constants and the last inequality uses the fact that Î·tâ€‹Î²â€‹sâ€‹L2â‰¤0.1â€‹Î¼subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ›½ğ‘ superscriptğ¿20.1ğœ‡\eta_{t}\beta sL^{2}\leq 0.1\mu. Therefore,

(bÏ„22â€‹aÏ„+cÏ„)â€‹âˆÏ„â€²=Ï„+1tâˆ’1(1âˆ’aÏ„â€²2)â‰¤Câ€²â€‹(G+Ïƒ)2â€‹(Ïµâ€‹Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î¸Î¼â€‹(Ï„+Î³)+Î²2â€‹pâ€‹s2â€‹Î¸2(Ï„+Î³)2)â€‹(t+Î³Ï„+Î³)âˆ’Ï.superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğœ22subscriptğ‘ğœsubscriptğ‘ğœsuperscriptsubscriptproductsuperscriptğœâ€²ğœ1ğ‘¡11subscriptğ‘superscriptğœâ€²2superscriptğ¶â€²superscriptğºğœ2italic-Ïµğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ ğœƒğœ‡ğœğ›¾superscriptğ›½2ğ‘superscriptğ‘ 2superscriptğœƒ2superscriptğœğ›¾2superscriptğ‘¡ğ›¾ğœğ›¾ğœŒ\displaystyle\left(\frac{b_{\tau}^{2}}{2a_{\tau}}+c_{\tau}\right)\prod_{\tau^{\prime}=\tau+1}^{t-1}\left(1-\frac{a_{\tau^{\prime}}}{2}\right)\leq C^{\prime}\left(G+\sigma\right)^{2}\left(\frac{\epsilon\beta ps\theta}{\mu(\tau+\gamma)}+\frac{\beta^{2}ps^{2}\theta^{2}}{(\tau+\gamma)^{2}}\right)\left(\frac{t+\gamma}{\tau+\gamma}\right)^{-\rho}.

It follows that

âˆ‘Ï„=0tâˆ’1(bÏ„22â€‹aÏ„+cÏ„)â€‹âˆÏ„â€²=Ï„+1tâˆ’1(1âˆ’aÏ„â€²2)superscriptsubscriptğœ0ğ‘¡1superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğœ22subscriptğ‘ğœsubscriptğ‘ğœsuperscriptsubscriptproductsuperscriptğœâ€²ğœ1ğ‘¡11subscriptğ‘superscriptğœâ€²2\displaystyle\sum_{\tau=0}^{t-1}\left(\frac{b_{\tau}^{2}}{2a_{\tau}}+c_{\tau}\right)\prod_{\tau^{\prime}=\tau+1}^{t-1}\left(1-\frac{a_{\tau^{\prime}}}{2}\right)
â‰¤Câ€²â€‹Ïµâ€‹(G+Ïƒ)2â€‹Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î¸â€‹Î¼âˆ’1â€‹(t+Î³)âˆ’Ïâ€‹âˆ‘Ï„=0tâˆ’1(Ï„+Î³)Ïâˆ’1absentsuperscriptğ¶â€²italic-Ïµsuperscriptğºğœ2ğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ ğœƒsuperscriptğœ‡1superscriptğ‘¡ğ›¾ğœŒsuperscriptsubscriptğœ0ğ‘¡1superscriptğœğ›¾ğœŒ1\displaystyle\leq C^{\prime}\epsilon\left(G+\sigma\right)^{2}\beta ps\theta\mu^{-1}(t+\gamma)^{-\rho}\sum_{\tau=0}^{t-1}(\tau+\gamma)^{\rho-1}
+Câ€²â€‹(G+Ïƒ)2â€‹Î²2â€‹pâ€‹s2â€‹Î¸2â€‹(t+Î³)âˆ’Ïâ€‹âˆ‘Ï„=0tâˆ’1(Ï„+Î³)Ïâˆ’2superscriptğ¶â€²superscriptğºğœ2superscriptğ›½2ğ‘superscriptğ‘ 2superscriptğœƒ2superscriptğ‘¡ğ›¾ğœŒsuperscriptsubscriptğœ0ğ‘¡1superscriptğœğ›¾ğœŒ2\displaystyle\qquad+C^{\prime}\left(G+\sigma\right)^{2}\beta^{2}ps^{2}\theta^{2}(t+\gamma)^{-\rho}\sum_{\tau=0}^{t-1}(\tau+\gamma)^{\rho-2}
â‰¤Câ€²â€‹Ïµâ€‹(G+Ïƒ)2â€‹Î²â€‹pâ€‹sâ€‹Î¸/(Ïâ€‹Î¼)+Câ€²â€‹(G+Ïƒ)2â€‹Î²2â€‹pâ€‹s2â€‹Î¸2Ïâˆ’1â€‹1t+Î³.absentsuperscriptğ¶â€²italic-Ïµsuperscriptğºğœ2ğ›½ğ‘ğ‘ ğœƒğœŒğœ‡superscriptğ¶â€²superscriptğºğœ2superscriptğ›½2ğ‘superscriptğ‘ 2superscriptğœƒ2ğœŒ11ğ‘¡ğ›¾\displaystyle\leq C^{\prime}\epsilon\left(G+\sigma\right)^{2}\beta ps\theta/(\rho\mu)+C^{\prime}\left(G+\sigma\right)^{2}\frac{\beta^{2}ps^{2}\theta^{2}}{\rho-1}\frac{1}{t+\gamma}.

In conclusion, we get that

ğ”¼â€‹[Î”t2]â‰¤(1+t/Î³)âˆ’Ïâ€‹Î”0+Câ€²â€‹ÏµÎ¼2â€‹(G+Ïƒ)2+Câ€²â€‹(G+Ïƒ)2â€‹Ï2(Ïâˆ’1)â€‹pâ€‹Î¼2â€‹1t+Î³.ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡2superscript1ğ‘¡ğ›¾ğœŒsubscriptÎ”0superscriptğ¶â€²italic-Ïµsuperscriptğœ‡2superscriptğºğœ2superscriptğ¶â€²superscriptğºğœ2superscriptğœŒ2ğœŒ1ğ‘superscriptğœ‡21ğ‘¡ğ›¾\mathbb{E}\left[\Delta_{t}^{2}\right]\leq\left(1+t/\gamma\right)^{-\rho}\Delta_{0}+\frac{C^{\prime}\epsilon}{\mu^{2}}\left(G+\sigma\right)^{2}+C^{\prime}\left(G+\sigma\right)^{2}\frac{\rho^{2}}{(\rho-1)p\mu^{2}}\frac{1}{t+\gamma}.

The proof for FedProx is completely analogous. The only difference is that we need to applyÂ LemmaÂ 3 instead ofÂ LemmaÂ 1 to bound the perturbation of the local proximal step. In the end, we get that

ğ”¼â€‹[Î”t+12âˆ£â„±t]â‰¤(1âˆ’atâ€²)â€‹Î”t2+btâ€²â€‹Î”t+ctâ€²,ğ”¼delimited-[]conditionalsuperscriptsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡12subscriptâ„±ğ‘¡1subscriptsuperscriptğ‘â€²ğ‘¡superscriptsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡2subscriptsuperscriptğ‘â€²ğ‘¡subscriptÎ”ğ‘¡subscriptsuperscriptğ‘â€²ğ‘¡\mathbb{E}\left[\Delta_{t+1}^{2}\mid{\mathcal{F}}_{t}\right]\leq(1-a^{\prime}_{t})\Delta_{t}^{2}+b^{\prime}_{t}\Delta_{t}+c^{\prime}_{t},

where

atâ€²superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡â€²\displaystyle a_{t}^{\prime} =Î²â€‹pâ€‹Î·tâ€‹(Î¼âˆ’Ïµâ€‹Bâ€‹Lâˆ’Î·tâ€‹L1âˆ’Î·tâ€‹Lâˆ’â€‹Bâ€‹Lâˆ’Î²â€‹Î·t2â€‹(1+Î·tâ€‹L1âˆ’Î·tâ€‹Lâˆ’)2â€‹B2â€‹L2),absentğ›½ğ‘subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğœ‡italic-Ïµğµğ¿subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptğ¿ğµğ¿ğ›½subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2superscript1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptğ¿2superscriptğµ2superscriptğ¿2\displaystyle=\beta p\eta_{t}\left(\mu-\sqrt{\epsilon}BL-\frac{\eta_{t}L}{1-\eta_{t}L_{-}}BL-\beta\frac{\eta_{t}}{2}\left(1+\frac{\eta_{t}L}{1-\eta_{t}L_{-}}\right)^{2}B^{2}L^{2}\right),
btâ€²superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡â€²\displaystyle b_{t}^{\prime} =Î²â€‹pâ€‹Î·tâ€‹(Ïµâ€‹(G+Ïƒ)+Î·tâ€‹L1âˆ’Î·tâ€‹Lâˆ’â€‹(G+Ïƒ)),absentğ›½ğ‘subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡italic-Ïµğºğœsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptğ¿ğºğœ\displaystyle=\beta p\eta_{t}\left(\sqrt{\epsilon}\left(G+\sigma\right)+\frac{\eta_{t}L}{1-\eta_{t}L_{-}}\left(G+\sigma\right)\right),
ctâ€²superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘¡â€²\displaystyle c_{t}^{\prime} =Î²2â€‹pâ€‹Î·tâ€‹Î·t2â€‹(1+Î·tâ€‹L1âˆ’Î·tâ€‹Lâˆ’)2â€‹(G2+Ïƒ2).absentsuperscriptğ›½2ğ‘subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡2superscript1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡ğ¿1subscriptğœ‚ğ‘¡subscriptğ¿2superscriptğº2superscriptğœ2\displaystyle=\beta^{2}p\eta_{t}\frac{\eta_{t}}{2}\left(1+\frac{\eta_{t}L}{1-\eta_{t}L_{-}}\right)^{2}\left(G^{2}+\sigma^{2}\right).

Following the same steps as above, we can further deduce that

ğ”¼â€‹[Î”t2]â‰¤(1+t/Î³)âˆ’Ïâ€‹Î”0+Câ€²â€‹ÏµÎ¼2â€‹(G+Ïƒ)2+Câ€²â€‹(G+Ïƒ)2â€‹Ï2(Ïâˆ’1)â€‹pâ€‹Î¼2â€‹1t+Î³,ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptsubscriptÎ”ğ‘¡2superscript1ğ‘¡ğ›¾ğœŒsubscriptÎ”0superscriptğ¶â€²italic-Ïµsuperscriptğœ‡2superscriptğºğœ2superscriptğ¶â€²superscriptğºğœ2superscriptğœŒ2ğœŒ1ğ‘superscriptğœ‡21ğ‘¡ğ›¾\mathbb{E}\left[\Delta_{t}^{2}\right]\leq\left(1+t/\gamma\right)^{-\rho}\Delta_{0}+\frac{C^{\prime}\epsilon}{\mu^{2}}\left(G+\sigma\right)^{2}+C^{\prime}\left(G+\sigma\right)^{2}\frac{\rho^{2}}{(\rho-1)p\mu^{2}}\frac{1}{t+\gamma},

where Ï=C0â€‹Î²â€‹pâ€‹Î¸â€‹Î¼2>1ğœŒsubscriptğ¶0ğ›½ğ‘ğœƒğœ‡21\rho=\frac{C_{0}\beta p\theta\mu}{2}>1. âˆ

Appendix D Proofs of lower bounds inÂ TheoremÂ 4

Lower bound 1

We first construct the hard instances and prove the lower bounds

ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸^)â€–22â‰¥Ïµâ€‹G24â€‹(1âˆ’Ïµ),andâ€‹ğ”¼â€‹â€–Î¸^âˆ’Î¸âˆ—â€–22â‰¥Ïµâ€‹G24â€‹Î¼2â€‹(1âˆ’Ïµ),formulae-sequenceğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹^ğœƒ22italic-Ïµsuperscriptğº241italic-Ïµandğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm^ğœƒsuperscriptğœƒ22italic-Ïµsuperscriptğº24superscriptğœ‡21italic-Ïµ\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left\|{\nabla F\left(\widehat{\theta}\right)}\right\|_{2}^{2}\geq\frac{\epsilon G^{2}}{4(1-\epsilon)},~{}~{}\text{and}~{}~{}\mathbb{E}\left\|{\widehat{\theta}-\theta^{*}}\right\|_{2}^{2}\geq\frac{\epsilon G^{2}}{4\mu^{2}(1-\epsilon)}, (40)

with uniform weights wi=1Msubscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–1ğ‘€w_{i}=\frac{1}{M}. We assume the PS selects all clients, among which an arbitrary Ïµitalic-Ïµ\epsilon-fraction can drop out in each round. Define

fâ€‹(Î¸)=L2â€‹â€–Î¸â€–22,gâ€‹(Î¸)=L2â€‹â€–Î¸+uLâ€–22,formulae-sequenceğ‘“ğœƒğ¿2superscriptsubscriptnormğœƒ22ğ‘”ğœƒğ¿2superscriptsubscriptnormğœƒğ‘¢ğ¿22f(\theta)=\frac{L}{2}\left\|{\theta}\right\|_{2}^{2},\qquad g(\theta)=\frac{L}{2}\left\|{\theta+\frac{u}{L}}\right\|_{2}^{2}, (41)

where uğ‘¢u is a fixed vector to be determined. Consider the following two instances:

  • â€¢

    Instance 1 (homogeneous case): Let â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸)=fâ€‹(Î¸)subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒğ‘“ğœƒ\ell_{i,t}(\theta)=f(\theta) for all i,tğ‘–ğ‘¡i,t;

  • â€¢

    Instance 2 (heterogeneous case): Let ğ’®âŠ†[M]ğ’®delimited-[]ğ‘€{\mathcal{S}}\subseteq[M] be a subset with cardinality âŒŠ(1âˆ’Ïµ)â€‹MâŒ‹1italic-Ïµğ‘€\lfloor{(1-\epsilon)M}\rfloor. Let

    â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸)={fâ€‹(Î¸),iâˆˆğ’®,âˆ€t,gâ€‹(Î¸),iâˆ‰ğ’®,âˆ€t.subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒcasesğ‘“ğœƒğ‘–ğ’®for-allğ‘¡ğ‘”ğœƒğ‘–ğ’®for-allğ‘¡\ell_{i,t}(\theta)=\begin{cases}f(\theta),&i\in{\mathcal{S}},~{}\forall t,\\ g(\theta),&i\not\in{\mathcal{S}},~{}\forall t.\end{cases}

Apparently, the two instances are indistinguishable if the adversary blocks all clients belonging to ğ’®csuperscriptğ’®ğ‘{\mathcal{S}}^{c} in every round. Therefore, any algorithm must output the same Î¸^^ğœƒ\widehat{\theta} under those two instances (a randomized algorithm outputs Î¸^^ğœƒ\widehat{\theta} with the same distribution).

Next we evaluate the objective functions in those two instances. It can be readily computed that

âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î¸)=Lâ€‹Î¸,âˆ‡gâ€‹(Î¸)=Lâ€‹Î¸+u=âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î¸)+u.formulae-sequenceâˆ‡ğ‘“ğœƒğ¿ğœƒâˆ‡ğ‘”ğœƒğ¿ğœƒğ‘¢âˆ‡ğ‘“ğœƒğ‘¢\nabla f(\theta)=L\theta,\qquad\nabla g(\theta)=L\theta+u=\nabla f(\theta)+u.

Let F1subscriptğ¹1F_{1} and F2subscriptğ¹2F_{2} denote the global objective functions of the two instances, respectively. Then we have

âˆ‡F1â€‹(Î¸)=âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î¸),âˆ‡F2â€‹(Î¸)=âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î¸)+Ïµâ€‹u.formulae-sequenceâˆ‡subscriptğ¹1ğœƒâˆ‡ğ‘“ğœƒâˆ‡subscriptğ¹2ğœƒâˆ‡ğ‘“ğœƒitalic-Ïµğ‘¢\nabla F_{1}(\theta)=\nabla f(\theta),\qquad\nabla F_{2}(\theta)=\nabla f(\theta)+\epsilon u.

By the triangle inequality,

â€–âˆ‡F1â€‹(Î¸)â€–2+â€–âˆ‡F2â€‹(Î¸)â€–2â‰¥Ïµâ€‹â€–uâ€–2,âˆ€Î¸.subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹1ğœƒ2subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹2ğœƒ2italic-Ïµsubscriptnormğ‘¢2for-allğœƒ\left\|{\nabla F_{1}(\theta)}\right\|_{2}+\left\|{\nabla F_{2}(\theta)}\right\|_{2}\geq\epsilon\left\|{u}\right\|_{2},\quad\forall\theta.

Consequently, for any Î¸^^ğœƒ\widehat{\theta}, we have

maxâ¡{ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡F1â€‹(Î¸^)â€–2,ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡F2â€‹(Î¸^)â€–2}â‰¥ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡F1â€‹(Î¸^)â€–2+ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡F1â€‹(Î¸^)â€–22â‰¥Ïµ2â€‹â€–uâ€–2.ğ”¼subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹1^ğœƒ2ğ”¼subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹2^ğœƒ2ğ”¼subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹1^ğœƒ2ğ”¼subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹1^ğœƒ22italic-Ïµ2subscriptnormğ‘¢2\max\left\{\mathbb{E}\|{\nabla F_{1}(\widehat{\theta})}\|_{2},\mathbb{E}\|{\nabla F_{2}(\widehat{\theta})}\|_{2}\right\}\geq\frac{\mathbb{E}\|{\nabla F_{1}(\widehat{\theta})}\|_{2}+\mathbb{E}\|{\nabla F_{1}(\widehat{\theta})}\|_{2}}{2}\geq\frac{\epsilon}{2}\left\|{u}\right\|_{2}.

Furthermore, both fğ‘“f and gğ‘”g are Î¼ğœ‡\mu-strongly convex with Î¼=L.ğœ‡ğ¿\mu=L. The minimizers of F1subscriptğ¹1F_{1} and F2subscriptğ¹2F_{2} are Î¸1âˆ—=0superscriptsubscriptğœƒ10\theta_{1}^{*}=0 and Î¸2âˆ—=âˆ’uâ€‹Ïµ/Lsuperscriptsubscriptğœƒ2ğ‘¢italic-Ïµğ¿\theta_{2}^{*}=-u\epsilon/L, respectively. Therefore, we similarly obtain that

maxâ¡{ğ”¼â€‹â€–Î¸^âˆ’Î¸1âˆ—â€–2,ğ”¼â€‹â€–Î¸^âˆ’Î¸2âˆ—â€–2}â‰¥ğ”¼â€‹â€–Î¸^âˆ’Î¸1âˆ—â€–2+ğ”¼â€‹â€–Î¸^âˆ’Î¸2âˆ—â€–22â‰¥â€–Î¸1âˆ—âˆ’Î¸2âˆ—â€–22=Ïµ2â€‹Lâ€‹â€–uâ€–2.ğ”¼subscriptnorm^ğœƒsuperscriptsubscriptğœƒ12ğ”¼subscriptnorm^ğœƒsuperscriptsubscriptğœƒ22ğ”¼subscriptnorm^ğœƒsuperscriptsubscriptğœƒ1âˆ—2ğ”¼subscriptnorm^ğœƒsuperscriptsubscriptğœƒ222subscriptnormsuperscriptsubscriptğœƒ1âˆ—superscriptsubscriptğœƒ2âˆ—22italic-Ïµ2ğ¿subscriptnormğ‘¢2\max\left\{\mathbb{E}\|{{\widehat{\theta}}-\theta_{1}^{*}}\|_{2},\mathbb{E}\|{{\widehat{\theta}}-\theta_{2}^{*}}\|_{2}\right\}\geq\frac{\mathbb{E}\|{\widehat{\theta}-\theta_{1}^{\ast}}\|_{2}+\mathbb{E}\|{\widehat{\theta}-\theta_{2}^{*}}\|_{2}}{2}\geq\frac{\|{\theta_{1}^{\ast}-\theta_{2}^{\ast}}\|_{2}}{2}=\frac{\epsilon}{2L}\left\|{u}\right\|_{2}.

It remains to choose uğ‘¢u and verify the heterogeneity condition in AssumptionÂ 1. The heterogeneity condition trivially holds on the first instance, so we only need to verify the second instance. To get the best lower bound, it boils to finding the largest â€–uâ€–2subscriptnormğ‘¢2\left\|{u}\right\|_{2} such that the second instance fulfills AssumptionÂ 1, that is, the optimal value of the following program:

â„°âˆ—â‰œmaxâ‰œsuperscriptâ„°\displaystyle{\mathcal{E}}^{*}\triangleq\max (12â€‹Ïµâ€‹â€–uâ€–2)2superscript12italic-Ïµsubscriptnormğ‘¢22\displaystyle~{}~{}\left(\frac{1}{2}\epsilon\left\|{u}\right\|_{2}\right)^{2}
s.t. (1âˆ’Ïµ)â€‹â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î¸)â€–22+Ïµâ€‹â€–âˆ‡gâ€‹(Î¸)â€–22â‰¤B2â€‹â€–âˆ‡F2â€‹(Î¸)â€–22+G2,âˆ€Î¸.1italic-Ïµsuperscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“ğœƒ22italic-Ïµsuperscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘”ğœƒ22superscriptğµ2superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹2ğœƒ22superscriptğº2for-allğœƒ\displaystyle~{}~{}(1-\epsilon)\left\|{\nabla f(\theta)}\right\|_{2}^{2}+\epsilon\left\|{\nabla g(\theta)}\right\|_{2}^{2}\leq B^{2}\left\|{\nabla F_{2}(\theta)}\right\|_{2}^{2}+G^{2},\quad\forall\theta.

To this end, we find sufficient conditions for the feasible set of uğ‘¢u:

(1âˆ’Ïµ)â€‹â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î¸)â€–22+Ïµâ€‹â€–âˆ‡gâ€‹(Î¸)â€–22â‰¤B2â€‹â€–âˆ‡F2â€‹(Î¸)â€–22+G2,âˆ€Î¸,1italic-Ïµsuperscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“ğœƒ22italic-Ïµsuperscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘”ğœƒ22superscriptğµ2superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹2ğœƒ22superscriptğº2for-allğœƒ\displaystyle~{}(1-\epsilon)\left\|{\nabla f(\theta)}\right\|_{2}^{2}+\epsilon\left\|{\nabla g(\theta)}\right\|_{2}^{2}\leq B^{2}\left\|{\nabla F_{2}(\theta)}\right\|_{2}^{2}+G^{2},\quad\forall\theta,
â‡”â‡”\displaystyle\Leftrightarrow â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î¸)â€–22+Ïµâ€‹â€–uâ€–22+2â€‹Ïµâ€‹âŸ¨âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î¸),uâŸ©â‰¤B2â€‹â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î¸)â€–22+Ïµ2â€‹B2â€‹â€–uâ€–22+2â€‹Ïµâ€‹B2â€‹âŸ¨âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î¸),uâŸ©+G2,âˆ€Î¸,superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“ğœƒ22italic-Ïµsuperscriptsubscriptnormğ‘¢222italic-Ïµâˆ‡ğ‘“ğœƒğ‘¢superscriptğµ2superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“ğœƒ22superscriptitalic-Ïµ2superscriptğµ2superscriptsubscriptnormğ‘¢222italic-Ïµsuperscriptğµ2âˆ‡ğ‘“ğœƒğ‘¢superscriptğº2for-allğœƒ\displaystyle~{}\left\|{\nabla f(\theta)}\right\|_{2}^{2}+\epsilon\left\|{u}\right\|_{2}^{2}+2\epsilon\left\langle\nabla f(\theta),u\right\rangle\leq B^{2}\left\|{\nabla f(\theta)}\right\|_{2}^{2}+\epsilon^{2}B^{2}\left\|{u}\right\|_{2}^{2}+2\epsilon B^{2}\left\langle\nabla f(\theta),u\right\rangle+G^{2},\quad\forall\theta,
â‡”â‡”\displaystyle\Leftrightarrow (Ïµâˆ’B2â€‹Ïµ2)â€‹â€–uâ€–22â‰¤minÎ¸â¡(B2âˆ’1)â€‹(â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î¸)â€–22+2â€‹Ïµâ€‹âŸ¨âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î¸),uâŸ©)+G2.italic-Ïµsuperscriptğµ2superscriptitalic-Ïµ2superscriptsubscriptnormğ‘¢22subscriptğœƒsuperscriptğµ21superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“ğœƒ222italic-Ïµâˆ‡ğ‘“ğœƒğ‘¢superscriptğº2\displaystyle~{}(\epsilon-B^{2}\epsilon^{2})\left\|{u}\right\|_{2}^{2}\leq\min_{\theta}(B^{2}-1)(\left\|{\nabla f(\theta)}\right\|_{2}^{2}+2\epsilon\left\langle\nabla f(\theta),u\right\rangle)+G^{2}. (42)

Recall that Bâ‰¥1ğµ1B\geq 1 and

â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î¸)â€–22+2â€‹Ïµâ€‹âŸ¨âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î¸),uâŸ©=â€–âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î¸)+Ïµâ€‹uâ€–22âˆ’Ïµ2â€‹â€–uâ€–22â‰¥âˆ’Ïµ2â€‹â€–uâ€–22.superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“ğœƒ222italic-Ïµâˆ‡ğ‘“ğœƒğ‘¢superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“ğœƒitalic-Ïµğ‘¢22superscriptitalic-Ïµ2superscriptsubscriptnormğ‘¢22superscriptitalic-Ïµ2superscriptsubscriptnormğ‘¢22\left\|{\nabla f(\theta)}\right\|_{2}^{2}+2\epsilon\left\langle\nabla f(\theta),u\right\rangle=\left\|{\nabla f(\theta)+\epsilon u}\right\|_{2}^{2}-\epsilon^{2}\left\|{u}\right\|_{2}^{2}\geq-\epsilon^{2}\left\|{u}\right\|_{2}^{2}.

Therefore, a sufficient condition for the constraint on uğ‘¢u is

(Ïµâˆ’B2â€‹Ïµ2)â€‹â€–uâ€–22â‰¤âˆ’(B2âˆ’1)â€‹Ïµ2â€‹â€–uâ€–22+G2italic-Ïµsuperscriptğµ2superscriptitalic-Ïµ2superscriptsubscriptnormğ‘¢22superscriptğµ21superscriptitalic-Ïµ2superscriptsubscriptnormğ‘¢22superscriptğº2\displaystyle~{}(\epsilon-B^{2}\epsilon^{2})\left\|{u}\right\|_{2}^{2}\leq-(B^{2}-1)\epsilon^{2}\left\|{u}\right\|_{2}^{2}+G^{2}
â‡”â‡”\displaystyle\Leftrightarrow (Ïµâˆ’Ïµ2)â€‹â€–uâ€–22â‰¤G2.italic-Ïµsuperscriptitalic-Ïµ2superscriptsubscriptnormğ‘¢22superscriptğº2\displaystyle~{}(\epsilon-\epsilon^{2})\left\|{u}\right\|_{2}^{2}\leq G^{2}.

We obtain that â„°âˆ—â‰¥Ïµ2â€‹G24â€‹(Ïµâˆ’Ïµ2)superscriptâ„°superscriptitalic-Ïµ2superscriptğº24italic-Ïµsuperscriptitalic-Ïµ2{\mathcal{E}}^{*}\geq\frac{\epsilon^{2}G^{2}}{4(\epsilon-\epsilon^{2})} and thus the desiredÂ (40).

Lower bound 2

Next, we establish the lower bounds

ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡Fâ€‹(Î¸^)â€–22â‰¥Ïµâ€‹Ïƒ24â€‹(1âˆ’Ïµ),ğ”¼â€‹â€–Î¸^âˆ’Î¸âˆ—â€–22â‰¥Ïµâ€‹Ïƒ24â€‹Î¼2â€‹(1âˆ’Ïµ).formulae-sequenceğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnormâˆ‡ğ¹^ğœƒ22italic-Ïµsuperscriptğœ241italic-Ïµğ”¼superscriptsubscriptnorm^ğœƒsuperscriptğœƒ22italic-Ïµsuperscriptğœ24superscriptğœ‡21italic-Ïµ\mathbb{E}\left\|{\nabla F\left(\widehat{\theta}\right)}\right\|_{2}^{2}\geq\frac{\epsilon\sigma^{2}}{4(1-\epsilon)},\qquad\mathbb{E}\left\|{\widehat{\theta}-\theta^{*}}\right\|_{2}^{2}\geq\frac{\epsilon\sigma^{2}}{4\mu^{2}(1-\epsilon)}.

Again we construct the hard instances based on (41) and prove the lower bounds with uniform weights wi=1subscriptğ‘¤ğ‘–1w_{i}=1 and noise variance Ïƒi=Ïƒ.subscriptğœğ‘–ğœ\sigma_{i}=\sigma. In (41), let uğ‘¢u be a fixed vector to be determined. Consider the following two instances:

  • â€¢

    Instance 1 (noiseless case): Let â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸)=fâ€‹(Î¸)subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒğ‘“ğœƒ\ell_{i,t}(\theta)=f(\theta) for all i,tğ‘–ğ‘¡i,t;

  • â€¢

    Instance 2 (noisy case): Choose StâŠ‚[M]subscriptğ‘†ğ‘¡delimited-[]ğ‘€S_{t}\subset[M] uniformly at random from all possible subsets with cardinality âŒŠ(1âˆ’Ïµ)â€‹MâŒ‹.1italic-Ïµğ‘€\lfloor(1-\epsilon)M\rfloor.

    â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸)={fâ€‹(Î¸),iâˆˆSt,gâ€‹(Î¸),iâˆˆStc.subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒcasesğ‘“ğœƒğ‘–subscriptğ‘†ğ‘¡ğ‘”ğœƒğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ‘†ğ‘¡ğ‘\ell_{i,t}(\theta)=\begin{cases}f(\theta),&i\in S_{t},\\ g(\theta),&i\in S_{t}^{c}.\end{cases}

In tğ‘¡t-th round, the adversary inspects the realization of Xi,tsubscriptğ‘‹ğ‘–ğ‘¡X_{i,t} and drops all clients in Stcsuperscriptsubscriptğ‘†ğ‘¡ğ‘S_{t}^{c}. Hence, the fraction of dropping-out clients is at most Ïµitalic-Ïµ\epsilon, and the two instances are indistinguishable.

Next we evaluate the difference between the global objective functions in those two instances denoted by F1subscriptğ¹1F_{1} and F2subscriptğ¹2F_{2}, respectively. By definition,

âˆ‡F1â€‹(Î¸)=Lâ€‹Î¸,âˆ‡F2â€‹(Î¸)=(1âˆ’Ïµ)â€‹âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î¸)+Ïµâ€‹âˆ‡gâ€‹(Î¸)=Lâ€‹Î¸+Ïµâ€‹u.formulae-sequenceâˆ‡subscriptğ¹1ğœƒğ¿ğœƒâˆ‡subscriptğ¹2ğœƒ1italic-Ïµâˆ‡ğ‘“ğœƒitalic-Ïµâˆ‡ğ‘”ğœƒğ¿ğœƒitalic-Ïµğ‘¢\nabla F_{1}(\theta)=L\theta,\qquad\nabla F_{2}(\theta)=(1-\epsilon)\nabla f(\theta)+\epsilon\nabla g(\theta)=L\theta+\epsilon u.

Following the argument in TheoremÂ 4, for any Î¸^^ğœƒ\widehat{\theta}, we have

maxâ¡{ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡F1â€‹(Î¸^)â€–2,ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡F2â€‹(Î¸^)â€–2}â‰¥ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡F1â€‹(Î¸^)â€–2+ğ”¼â€‹â€–âˆ‡F1â€‹(Î¸^)â€–22â‰¥Ïµ2â€‹â€–uâ€–2.ğ”¼subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹1^ğœƒ2ğ”¼subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹2^ğœƒ2ğ”¼subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹1^ğœƒ2ğ”¼subscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ¹1^ğœƒ22italic-Ïµ2subscriptnormğ‘¢2\max\left\{\mathbb{E}\|{\nabla F_{1}(\widehat{\theta})}\|_{2},\mathbb{E}\|{\nabla F_{2}(\widehat{\theta})}\|_{2}\right\}\geq\frac{\mathbb{E}\|{\nabla F_{1}(\widehat{\theta})}\|_{2}+\mathbb{E}\|{\nabla F_{1}(\widehat{\theta})}\|_{2}}{2}\geq\frac{\epsilon}{2}\left\|{u}\right\|_{2}.

Similarly, both fğ‘“f and gğ‘”g are Î¼ğœ‡\mu-strongly convex with Î¼=L.ğœ‡ğ¿\mu=L. The minimizers of F1subscriptğ¹1F_{1} and F2subscriptğ¹2F_{2} are Î¸1âˆ—=0superscriptsubscriptğœƒ10\theta_{1}^{*}=0 and Î¸2âˆ—=âˆ’uâ€‹Ïµ/Lsuperscriptsubscriptğœƒ2ğ‘¢italic-Ïµğ¿\theta_{2}^{*}=-u\epsilon/L, respectively. Therefore,

maxâ¡{ğ”¼â€‹â€–Î¸^âˆ’Î¸1âˆ—â€–2,ğ”¼â€‹â€–Î¸^âˆ’Î¸2âˆ—â€–2}â‰¥ğ”¼â€‹â€–Î¸^âˆ’Î¸1âˆ—â€–2+ğ”¼â€‹â€–Î¸^âˆ’Î¸2âˆ—â€–22â‰¥Ïµ2â€‹Lâ€‹â€–uâ€–2.ğ”¼subscriptnorm^ğœƒsuperscriptsubscriptğœƒ12ğ”¼subscriptnorm^ğœƒsuperscriptsubscriptğœƒ22ğ”¼subscriptnorm^ğœƒsuperscriptsubscriptğœƒ12ğ”¼subscriptnorm^ğœƒsuperscriptsubscriptğœƒ222italic-Ïµ2ğ¿subscriptnormğ‘¢2\max\left\{\mathbb{E}\|{{\widehat{\theta}}-\theta_{1}^{*}}\|_{2},\mathbb{E}\|{{\widehat{\theta}}-\theta_{2}^{*}}\|_{2}\right\}\geq\frac{\mathbb{E}\|{{\widehat{\theta}}-\theta_{1}^{*}}\|_{2}+\mathbb{E}\|{{\widehat{\theta}}-\theta_{2}^{*}}\|_{2}}{2}\geq\frac{\epsilon}{2L}\left\|{u}\right\|_{2}.

The clients in both instances are homogeneous and thus fulfills AssumptionÂ 1. It remains to evaluate the variance of the noisy gradients in the second instance. To get the best lower bound, it boils down to finding the optimal value of the following program:

â„°âˆ—â‰œmaxâ‰œsuperscriptâ„°\displaystyle{\mathcal{E}}^{*}\triangleq\max (12â€‹Ïµâ€‹â€–uâ€–2)2superscript12italic-Ïµsubscriptnormğ‘¢22\displaystyle~{}~{}\left(\frac{1}{2}\epsilon\left\|{u}\right\|_{2}\right)^{2}
s.t. ğ—ğ–ºğ—‹â€‹[âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸)]â‰¤Ïƒ2.ğ—ğ–ºğ—‹delimited-[]âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒsuperscriptğœ2\displaystyle~{}~{}\mathsf{var}\left[\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta)\right]\leq\sigma^{2}.

Following the definition of â„“i,tsubscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡\ell_{i,t}, we have

ğ—ğ–ºğ—‹â€‹[âˆ‡â„“i,tâ€‹(Î¸)]=Ïµâ€‹(1âˆ’Ïµ)â€‹â€–uâ€–22â‰¤Ïƒ2.ğ—ğ–ºğ—‹delimited-[]âˆ‡subscriptâ„“ğ‘–ğ‘¡ğœƒitalic-Ïµ1italic-Ïµsuperscriptsubscriptnormğ‘¢22superscriptğœ2\mathsf{var}\left[\nabla\ell_{i,t}(\theta)\right]=\epsilon(1-\epsilon)\left\|{u}\right\|_{2}^{2}\leq\sigma^{2}.

Therefore, â„°âˆ—â‰¥Ïµ2â€‹Ïƒ24â€‹Ïµâ€‹(1âˆ’Ïµ)superscriptâ„°superscriptitalic-Ïµ2superscriptğœ24italic-Ïµ1italic-Ïµ{\mathcal{E}}^{*}\geq\frac{\epsilon^{2}\sigma^{2}}{4\epsilon(1-\epsilon)}.

Remark 4.

If the objective functions are not required to be strongly convex, the above construction of hard instances can be extended to show the necessity of Ïµâ€‹B2â‰¤Oâ€‹(1)italic-Ïµsuperscriptğµ2ğ‘‚1\epsilon B^{2}\leq O(1) as required in our main theorems. In particular, similar arguments continue for a general pair of functions fğ‘“f and gğ‘”g satisfying âˆ‡gâ€‹(Î¸)=âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î¸)+uâˆ‡ğ‘”ğœƒâˆ‡ğ‘“ğœƒğ‘¢\nabla g(\theta)=\nabla f(\theta)+u. Suppose âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î¸)âˆ‡ğ‘“ğœƒ\nabla f(\theta) lies in some linear subspace that is orthogonal to uğ‘¢u, so that âŸ¨âˆ‡fâ€‹(Î¸),uâŸ©=0.âˆ‡ğ‘“ğœƒğ‘¢0\left\langle\nabla f(\theta),u\right\rangle=0. If Ïµâ€‹B2>1italic-Ïµsuperscriptğµ21\epsilon B^{2}>1, then (42) and thus AssumptionÂ 1 are always satisfied regardless of â€–uâ€–2subscriptnormğ‘¢2\left\|{u}\right\|_{2}, which yields a lower bound of âˆ\infty. Therefore, under a more heterogeneous environment, the federated learning system should be better protected from adversarial dropout.

Appendix E Experiments

In this section, we provide the detailed setups and additional experiments.

Hardware Setups: we run all the experiments on a cluster with 8 Tesla V100 Volta GPUs and 80 Intel Xeon E5 CPUs. The codes are built upon PyTorch 1.13.1 [PGM+19].
